name: Gernerts Goldens
text: I have no complaints!  They were professional, and hard working. They did a wonderful job replacing our garage door after our original one was damaged by hurricane Sally.  We highly recommend this company.

name: Gilbert Nicholson
text: They did a great job from start to finish on my new garage door. They explained everything thoroughly up front and patiently answered all my questions. The installers were on time. The price was very competitive. I’m going to hire them again to replace my other garage door.

name: Dina Teague
text: I was very pleased with the service I received from Affordable Garage Doors.  They replied promptly, and on time.  Very professional and courteous.  They had to replace one of my motor on one of the garage doors, they also oiled and cleaned the other garage door.  I would recommend this company.

name: Joan Johnson
text: I’m giving 5 stars. I purchased my home 4 years ago and Affordable replaced the motor and later when the panels were damaged by my car, they saved what they could and gave me a fair price for the panels that had to be replaced. They answered my call and did the work on a timely basis. You can trust them.

name: Bill Rhegness
text: This company is a very worthwhile choice if you need to replace or repair a garage door. I found them to be punctual in their response, very professional in their skills and very reasonable in their prices. I wouldn't hesitate to use them again.

name: Chris Duncan
text: Top notch customer service and super friendly. And not to mention very thorough. Would recommend to everyone. These  guys are just flat out awesome.

name: Nadiah Faruk Khan
text: They were professional, ON TIME and did a great job for our garage. I would also add that they went above and beyond since there were few items weren’t in stock but they got it handled on the same day! Highly recommended!

name: Patti Tole
text: The technician was incredibly helpful. Stayed on the phone with us until we had it all figured out. Our technician was Robert Miller and he is aces!  He is a great asset to this company; friendly, helpful, and dedicated to getting our problem taken care of.

resp.text: We love him here at ATRGD as well Patti ,thank you for the review it means the world to us that our customers like us so much!

name: Sheri Gallyot
text: I knew Charles from helping him build his website. And when our garage door didn't open one day, I knew who to call. He and his wife came out the very next day and were very helpful. They showed us where we had one spring snap and the other one was well on its way too. He had the parts with him and was able to fix our garage door back in working order within the hour! That was over a year ago and we have had no garage door issues since. Hopefully we don't, but if we do... we will be calling Charles with Garage Doors 4 U!

name: Donald Hartman
text: Service was great and called stating they would be earlier than expected. I had a bad door removed and a new door installed and the service was completed timely. My old doors were taken away and they cleaned up after job completion. I was looking to replace our door and due to stock availability and scheduling we were able to set up appointment within a week. This was great timing as some of the big box stores had estimated 8-10 weeks and they handled installation. We are very happy that we selected them for our needs and would recommend them for anyone needing garage door service.

name: Angel Tillman
text: Very easy experience- Charles was efficient and showed up when he said he would.  My garage door was fixed quickly, and he didn’t try to sell me anything I didn’t need. Would definitely recommend.

name: Debbie Jenkins
text: I can't say enough good things about Charles and his workmanship! OUTSTANDING customer service and repair work! He repaired my garage door better than it was before the problem. He didn't try and sell me something, just repaired the door. I would highly recommend him. If I could give him a 10, I would.

name: Gaijakori Saladdina
text: We called them to replace our garage door's lowermost panel because they had great reviews, and we needed a fast response time. They arrived on schedule and went straight to work. Their team was professional, detailed, and fast with the installation. Thank you for your speedy service!

name: yourbuddystoo1
text: This is my second time working with Charles at Garage Doors 4 U. His communication is great. Always on time. Work is quick and efficient. Very pleased. Thanks!

name: Kim Sorrell
text: I love love my new doors! Garage doors 4 U were amazing to work with it !  This job was perfect and can’t say enough good things about customer service and putting me as a client first . Highly recommend !

name: lisa yates
text: Called on a Friday. They came on a Saturday. Came earlier than expected which worked great for me. Love a company that may under promise but over deliver. Mine was an easy fix but they were so kind to not make me feel stupid. I would use them again and recommend to my neighbors and friends.

name: Michelle Coggins
text: I’ve used this guy in the past but never again.  His cost is the exact same as Thomasino yet he doesn’t have the overhead.  He marked no warranty on my receipt.  His kid made water spots on a antique chest that was in the garage and all he said was “yeah on your broke furniture”.  This dude is beyond disrespectful and I’ve never had any contractor be this rude.  Don’t make the mistake of dealing with this guy.

name: Jody brewer
text: Excellent service; highly recommend Garage Doors 4 U; professional, great job with installation!!!! Called Friday morning with an emergency need and they came the same day.

name: Courtney Rogers
text: Did an awesome job on our garage door! Came the very next day, got the door ordered & replaced it as soon as the order came in! And his prices were great too! Would highly recommend!!

name: David Schmitt
text: Charles and his team did an incredible job on my garage door.  He is thorough, responds when you call him, does excellent work and charges very fair prices.  I would highly recommend him to anyone for their garage door needs, business or residential.  He is respectful, polite and knows exactly what he is doing.

name: Kim Hess
text: He did a great job installing our 3 garage doors!    They look amazing and he did it for such a good price.   Very pleased

name: Matt Cook
text: Charles did a great job! He is quick to respond, easy to talk with, provides accurate estimates and understands the need to do repairs in the least expensive way possible while also doing a quality job. I highly recommend him.

name: Nancy Walker
text: Charles did an excellent job!  In addition, he is punctual, does  good work, and charges a reasonable price.  We highly recommend him.

name: Kiva Karmen
text: This Company is AWESOME. Garage Doors 4 U are not only punctual but they are VERY professional.  My quote was straight forward and the price for the excellent quality of service was very reasonable and competitive. Their work ethic is impeccable and their customer service is flawless.  It took them no time to replace the springs on my garage door.  Most of their reviews are on Angie's list, so I took a gamble reading reviews on Google. I must say I was not disappointed.

name: Louis Smith
text: We had to wait a couple of days, but they showed up early, brought the exact supplies that the needed, and were gone in under 20 minutes. They were fast and friendly and left the door in better shape than it's original construction.

name: Oscar Becerra
text:
Great Job. Charles replaced my whole door at a very reasonable price.
Fast response and excellent service.

name: Russ Darracott
text:
Absolutely stellar work. Art was my installer - request him if you can! He was prompt, courteous, and answered my barrage of questions to help me make some final design decisions. He also took the time to show me what the carriage hardware would look like in different configurations so I would have my dream garage exactly how I wanted. Further, he installed all my garage door openers, set all the remotes, and walked me through coding my keypad.

Pricing was quite fair - you certainly get what you pay for; it was well worth the cost of the installation, quality of materials, and amount of time it saved me from trying to install the openers myself.

Morgan, my contact in the office, was excellent. I had conference calls for work most of the day during my installation. She corresponded with me through text message to make it as easy and convenient as possible.

While it did take some time for my door to arrive, this was beyond the control of the company. They let me know as soon as it had arrived and scheduled my installation for the next day. Overall, I’m incredibly happy with the work completed, but Art and Morgan made this so easy. I highly recommend a raise for both of them - they will be your reason for repeat business from customers like me.

resp.text: Thank you, Russ

name: Shawn Storm
text: Good experience from the front office to the technicians.  Quick response, reasonably priced, and good service/installation.  Would use again and recommend to others.

resp.text: Thank you, Shawn.  I'm glad you had a good experience.

name: Heather Colley

name: Krista Sparks
text: The Shoals Overhead Door team did an absolutely fantastic job throughout the entire process of quoting/ordering/installing my garage door; they were beyond professional and helpful, and got everything done even sooner than promised, from coming out to quote the project all the way to installation. This was extremely important to me after having had to deal with several troubleshooting issues due to working with an older home, as well as another local company’s failure to complete the job, which had put us behind schedule on the renovation and created a chain reaction of one inconvenience after another. Tommy was extremely accommodating and patient while helping me design and order my door, and I could not be happier with it. I was surprised by all of the available options, which would have been much more expensive elsewhere. It looks amazing and unique, and I am thrilled. Daniel did an awesome job with installation and easily figured out how to make it work in spite of the various obstacles we had to work around. He had a great attitude and got the door up so quickly I couldn’t believe it. I honestly can’t say enough about what a great job this company did taking care of this for me and I would highly recommend them to anyone in the market for a new garage door. Thank you guys again so much!

resp.text: Thanks Krista.  I'm glad you're happy with your purchase.

text: I’m a Navy veteran and I was just seeing the price of garage doors. On my end it seemed like I got hung up on. They sent me a text message letting me know that their cellphone service dropped and that they didn’t hang up on me.

text: I spoke to several companies before choosing Affordable Garage doors to replace both doors. I couldn't be more pleased. The price was right and the service outstanding. I highly recommend them.

name: Dan Davis
text: Called Affordable Garage Doors when my garage door spring broke. They responded quickly and performed good work. When you need help, they come to fix it. Will use them again if needed. Happy with the experience from the phone operator to the repair person who came to the house.

name: Karla Jones
text: I could not open my garage door.  I called Affordable Garage Doors for an estimate and they quickly sent a link to a FB video showing how to unlock from using the door manually. I am very grateful for their friendly, helpful advice.  I would totally call again if I ever need assistance.

resp.text: Ms Jones, thank you for the kind words. A lot of companies would charge a service call to come out to your home to make the minor adjustment that you were experiencing. However, we figure that if we can save you some money by showing you how to make the minor adjustment yourself then the next time you, or your neighbor or family member need garage door services on a major repair or need to purchase new garage doors, you’ll remember us and refer those folks to Affordable Garage Doors.

name: don hill
text: Tell you a time of 4to7 calls after 7 be to my house in half hour. Called the office and all they said I was being unreasonable. So I will not deal they anymore . There was a lot other thing said but I made it easy. I wanted to give them zero star but site wouldn’t let me.

resp.text:
This is Skye Underwood, owner of AffordableGarageDoors.com and as all our customers know, they can always reach me directly on my cell phone at 205.718.2457 if they ever have any questions or issues. We're a small, family-owned company who takes pride in serving our customers with the utmost respect and professionalism.

However, I've learned over the last ten years of being in business that you cannot make every single person happy, and this was certainly the case with Mr. and Mrs. Hill.

Unfortunately, it sounds like Mr. Hill left out some important details in his review, like the part where we canceled his appointment and refused his business after his profanity laced rant when we called to apologize and inform him that we would be 10 minutes late for his appointment.

And we realize that these our difficult times for everyone right now during the pandemic, but it's important that we not lose our humanity and dignity in how we treat our fellow man. God bless.

name: Steven Harper
text: Skye, the owner and technician were / are nothing short of impeccable! Exemplary service, great pricing and truly honest, ethical, upstanding individuals to do business with! HIGHLY recommend to ALL!

resp.text: Mr. Harper, you were such a pleasure to work with and I'm always so humbled when a home owner takes time out of their day to leave us a review. I can't thank you enough for the kind words and the business! I hope you guys are loving the new garage door! -- Skye Underwood, owner

name: Shir
text:
The reviews listed below about the service fee being applied to your total is untrue. The gear on my garage door broke and the part is sold online for 30 bucks. I figured instead of a diy project I would pay these guys the service fee and have them fix it.

After 20 minutes the gear  was replaced and the bill was $195.00. If I knew that It was going to cost me that much I would have done it myself.

I will not be recommending this company. I should have known all of the perfect 5 star reviews were too good to be legit.

***** update The owner said I was never a customer and then deleted his comment...so after  searching I found the receipt that doesnt exist for the amount that didn't  get charged according to the owner. The owner is dishonest and reviews are fake.

name: shereen walker
text: Great company and customer service.  I had my garage door and motor replaced for a very reasonable price and they did a awesome job.  The owner came out the day before and took measurements and the installer came out the following day to install. the installation took less than four hours to take down my old door, tracks and motor, then put all the new equipment up.  The quality of the door is outstanding and the installer was efficient. They even hauled away my old material.  I would recommend this company to anyone!

resp.text: Mrs. Walker, I honestly wish I would have replied to your review sooner so I could thank you. Thank you so much for sharing your experience of doing business with us -- it goes a long way with future potential customers, so I can't thank you enough for taking the time to post it. And thank you so much for the business! -- Skye Underwood

Call these guys before you go anywhere else...job well done and worth every penny.

text: I received quotes from 3 separate companies for 2 new garage doors. I am glad you chose the Clopay Premium Series (Steel Front, Insulated Middle, Steel Back) garage doors because they add the best security and energy efficiency when compared to a vinyl back garage door. It's customers like yourself that encourages us to keep striving to be the very best in the garage door industry. Thank you, again.

text: Great company and customer service.  We had our Garage door replaced for a very reasonable price and they did a fantastic job. name: J D Mitchell
text: Better, and less expensive, than expected.  I called and talked with owner, Mr. Underwood, and was very pleased to be told that the $85 Service Call Fee would be applied to any Tune-Up or repair  done to my garage door. After the Tune-Up and minor repair/adjustments, the Affordable fee stayed at $85.   I had called Precision Garage Doors in Birmingham and was quoted $69 for the Service Call and $99 for a Tune-Up. When I  asked Precision  if the $69 Service Call fee would be applied to the Tune-Up or repair fee, I was told, "NO, the two fees are separate and $168 would be the minimum."  Obviously I did not go with Precision and very glad I called Affordable Garage Doors.  The technician was on time, polite and efficient, and it all resulted in a very uncomplicated process.  I give Affordable Garage Doors 5 Stars!!

resp.text: Mr. Mitchell, that was a very well thought out, descriptive review of your process in choosing a garage door company. I'm sure your review will save A LOT of people time when they need to hire a garage door company. Thank you so much for the kind words and especially the business.

name: Lisa Drummond
text: Thank you Affordable Garage Doors for a job well done!  We love our new garage door!  We especially loved your attention to customer service, and quick response to questions and concerns during installation!!  The super quiet opener is a wonderful upgrade, since our son's bedroom is directly above the garage!!

resp.text: Mrs. Drummond, glad that you were so satisfied. We appreciate you choosing #AffordableGarageDoors and it was truly a pleasure doing business with you and your husband.

text: Great company, fantastic communication, and an even better service experience.  Easy recommendation.

I passed on your sentiments to Eric, the technician that completed your job and I could tell that it made his day. Again, thank you so much for the kind words!

name: Jeffrey Roberts
text: By far the best price in the area and in this day and age where it's hard to get a real person on the telephone, I was able to speak with the owner of the company and he helped guide me through the decision making process. I was able to buy two insulated garage doors from Affordable Garage Doors and they gave me a better price than two other companies quoted me for uninsulated doors! The installer called me an hour before my appointment to let me know that he was in route and when he showed up he quickly got to work. I couldn't be more satisfied with this company and would highly recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: Mr. Roberts, thank you so much for taking the time out of your evening to review us. I really enjoyed meeting you and hearing the old stories about your playing days for Banks High School. It's people like you that make me so passionate about #AffordableGarageDoors and how we approach customer service - we simply treat our customers like family. Thank you for welcoming me into your home and treating me like family!  -Skye Underwood owner AffordableGarageDoors.com

name: George Campbell
text:
I drove through my garage door , completely destroying it, about 4 in the evening.  I called Affordable, they came the next morning, removed and replaced all trim, tracks, springs, rollers, and door, then removed all refuse.  He was able to do this during heavy rain, an estate sale was occuring, so people were wandering around and getting in his way while he was working.  He was able to accomplish this without outwardly losing his temper or causing anyone to need to seek medical attention.
I replaced this door about six years ago, when my mother backed from the garage without opening the door.  The company she used took nearly three weeks ordering the door, then installing it.   It was poorly done, with gaps on both sides of door. These allowed so much light in during the day, that lights were not needed during the day.  It was a solid door, no windows.  It also made so much noise, it would awaken me from sleep.  My bedroom is on the opposite end of the house. Jeff did such a great job installing this door!  It is the exact door that I destroyed.  Not only does not light come in when closed, but you wouldn't believe how quiet it was when it operates!  The other popped and creaked when opening and closing.  Jeff didn't have to replace the motor, just everything else.  I promise you, I thought the noise it makes now is negligible!

Many thanks to Jeff,  and Sky Underwood. Skype took my original called, calmed me down, got me worked in the following morning, and everything he told to executed exactly as he said!  Which, in my experience,  is very rare.  Oh, the prior door that momma got cost either 1200 or 1500 dollars.  This was 750 total, less than 24 hours from my original distress call, and flawlessly executed.

This was such a pleasant experience,  I nearly wanted to buy two doors!

resp.text: Mr. Campbell, what a fantastic review! We can't thank you enough for taking time out of your day to tell other potential customers about your experience working with us at AffordableGarageDoors.com! We hang our hat on exceptional customer service and we hope our clients realize that's what separates us from the completion. Again, thank you so much for your kind, transparent review!

name: Shondell Scott
text: Efficiency, price , quality and clean up afterwards!

resp.text: Thank you, Ms. Scott! We love the Desert Tan paint color you went with on your door.

text: The owner is a fraud and complete phoney

name: David Johnson
text: Affordable Garage Doors has always been great to deal with. I have purchased multiple doors and referred my in-laws who were also very pleased. I would not hesitate to hire them again and refer others.

name: Cliff Ferguson
text: My old garage door was constantly coming off the track.  I called this company and they replaced it with a new highly insulated garage door with a belt drive lifter.  Not only was it much more quiet, but it was also a smart door.  I could check to be sure I had closed my garage door from my smart phone.  When I called them they came out that day and gave an estimate.  They ordered it and within a week it was installed.  I would highly recommend this company.

name: Debra Melaney
text: Very responsive throughout the entire experience from original sales and estimate visit through the installation. Door looks beautiful, fits nicely and works well. Delivery and installation was on time. Workers were courteous and efficient.

name: Sherri Kay
text: Josh has come to fix my garage door twice now, and he's done a great job. He was super fast getting out here, (next day service), and Josh is the very best. He got my garage door working and fixed the sensor in what seemed like minutes. Definitely give them a call...

name: K. Jenise Filiatrault
text: Fast fast fast service I should have called sooner to fix our garage door. Their technician Josh is very professional, knowledgeable and kind. Our 19 year old garage is working like a champ again!

name: Jessica Seguin
text: I had someone come out due to my garage door sensors malfunctioning and they were awesome! He was very friendly and explained to me exactly what was wrong with my garage door. Once he determined the issue, he gave a reasonable quote and repaired within 30 minutes. Very quick work and very professional! He even gave me tips on what to look for to avoid future costs and/or repairs.

name: rebeca villasenor
text: A month ago I called to get an estimate for my garage door replacement. I was kindly greeted and given estimates. I sat an appointment for someone to come out and look at it. I was given several options and sat a later appointment. The appointment was looking like two weeks outs but my technician said if they had any cancellations the could possibly squeeze me in sooner. Within that afternoon I received a call from the same technician saying they had and opening for the following day. I am beyond pleased and satisfied with my new garage door and opener.

name: T Richie
text: Nothing like a nonmoving garage door - couldn't even open it manually and of course both vehicles were stuck inside the garage. Called first thing Monday morning and they lady answering was so very kind and straightforward. She did not make any promises other than we will come sometime today and get your door open so you can get your cars out. I completely expected to wait a day or two or three for parts, etc. COVID has delayed everything so I wasn't expecting same day service. We were pleasantly surprised about the speed of the repair. We had the pleasure of having Larry come to our home. He was such a delight, so nice, professional and efficient! Thank you all for the excellent service!

name: Lynne Duchock
text: My garage door spring broke.  I called, got a quote, and they were here within the week.  Technician was extremely helpful and informational.

name: Todd Kurzhal
text: Wayne was our service man. He arrived on time. Repaired our door that came off the track within an hour. He added a missing garage opener button in the garage and programmed my wife's car to open both garage door openers. He was gracious. Just a wonderful person to work with. Thank you Wayne!

name: Cherish Thompson
text: Larry was so awesome. He came out and fix our garage in under 20 minutes. I think he may have even oiled it up because its working smoother than ever.  I would highly recommend!

name: Tony Martin
text: Purchased garage door opener on 1/15/16 from Home Depot and signed up for installation about 3:00 pm. Valley Overhead was calling by close of business to schedule an appointment for installation.  Garage door opener was successfully installed the next morning by 10:00 am.  I was grateful for the quick installation as I was having to manually open and close the garage door to get the SUV in/out of the garage during this cold weather.  I thanked Phil Hall for the quick service in an e-mail immediately following the installation!

name: Glenn Byrum
text: Great place to do business  friendly staff and fast.

name: Bill Biesanz
text:
Very professional, excellent work!  Quick and easy to schedule an appointment.

Will do business again!

name: Brandon Patterson
text: This is my first commercial door install.. Valley Overhead door came in prior to the installation and asked me several details(heating and cooling door recomendations, door placement, door stabilization options). Their professional work performed will certainly lead us to use them for all of our door needs. Thankful we chose the right company. Thank you Valley Overhead door.

name: David Hendriks
text: I have done business with Valley Overhead Door many times over the last 20 years.  I had a scheduled appointment to install new door panels ($650.00) between 10 and 11 AM so I left the rear door to the detached garage open for the technicians to come do the work whenever they showed up.  I left word on their answering service to come when they wanted to and that I would leave the door open for the technicians to come in and do the job since I may not be present at the time they come.  The next morning, I got two voice mail messages on my cell phone stating they were there at 8 AM and wanted to do the work earlier because another customer backed out.  I return the calls at 10:30 AM and spoke to Phil Hall.  He said we have been calling you all morning and wanted to know why I didn't answer.  I said I was asleep and didn't hear the phone ring.  Phil said, "Well it must be nice to sleep as long as you want to every day!"  I said "Yes it is."  Phil said "Well we've wasted two hours of our time!"  I said "Well just don't come out then."  He said "What did you say!"  I said "You heard me!"  Phil hung up on me.  Phil was rude and unprofessional.  He blamed me for their scheduling problem and the back door was open for them to do the work.

Garett was very friendly and answered all of my questions. I will recommend Precision Garage Repair to anyone. I called for an appointment  at 1 pm and Precision had Garett at my place at 5 the same day.
. Excellent service with a fair price. Awesome experience.

name: James J
text:
I called and was scheduled an appointment within 2 days; great! My technician Cameron was absolutely OUTSTANDING! He quoted me prior to any work, explained in detailed the issue, provided a walkthrough of what he would do to remedy the problem and then fixed it.... that day. This included the replacement of a 10-12 foot bar I assumed would require me to make another appointment for him to replace. No, he came prepared with all tools and parts needed to complete the job without a repeat visit! Job WELL DONE A++!
I felt secure leaving him unattended in the garage to finish the work and when I walked into the garage I always found him working, not on his phone like other repairmen I have had. Cameron was professional and courteous. He was not annoyed that I asked questions and even made suggestions about future repairs that I could make to avoid costly ones later down the road, like preventative maintenance.
I have no idea if this is company training or just a good technician. Judging by the rating other customers have given though I can safely assume this is mostly good hiring techniques and training in combination with a great tech.
My only regret is I did not call them sooner and that they do not build storage sheds. I will be recommending this company, specifically Cameron, to anyone needing garage door installation or repairs. I hope they let me know if they build storage sheds in the future and other honey-do stuff I was tasked with by the wife.

Our garage door was 14 years old and the springs broke, so we had a complete overhaul done, the garage door works better than when we had the house built and is super quiet now! The price was very fair and The tech Dylon Byrd was extremely professional and knowledgeable and did a super job!
I would (and already have) recommend Precision Door to friends or family, I find them to be very honest and that’s super important to me!

name: John Duke
text:
I HIGHLY recommend Precision Garage Door Mobile.  The roll up door that was originally installed by another company in my garage/workshop failed.  I called Precision and they came out the same day.  Emanuel was very helpful and knowledgable.  He was patient with my many questions.  After some conversation, I decided to replace me roll up door rather than fix my existing door.

The door I needed was in stock so Emanuel came back the next day to install the door.  Even though it was the coldest and windiest day of the fall/winter season thus far, he worked efficiently and effectively.  He was most professional and his work was done in a masterfully craftsmanlike manner.

By doing a side by side comparison of the door that was originally installed to the door installed by Precision Garage Door - Mobile, it is obvious the door installed by Precision Garage Door is far superior.  This door has all steel gears and is thicker in gauge that then original.  The chain hoist is a one piece all steel design where the original door was plastic.  My only regret is that I did not originally call Precision Garage Door - Mobile.

Thank you Precision Garage Door- Mobile for a job well done.  Please express my sincere appreciation to Emanuel for his expertise, advise, guidance, and masterful skill.

resp.text:
Mr. Duke,
We will be sure to let Emanuel know all the wonderful things you had to write about him in this review.  Emanuel is one of our top techs who truly cares about quality of work and providing excellent customer service.  We really appreciate you taking the time to write this amazing review and look forward to having you as a customer for life!

Van didn't waste any time getting to work and offering a variety of options to meet my specific needs including the benefit and value of each.  Once we agreed on an appropriate choice, Van went right to work explaining, when asked, the details of his operation.  Once he was finished, he reviewed his work and additional suggestions to consider in the future.  If I could leave 6 or 7 stars for this service, I would.  I was very impressed by Precision Door Services' promptness and professionalism and have already solicited their service to my neighbors who will be calling them very soon.  Hats off to Precision Door Service and many kudos to Van.  Chris was another technician that has helped us just prior to Van and he provided the same outstanding service. name: Mike Rice
text: Spring broke on a garage door. Called for a repair appointment, was told a technician would be there between 1:00 and 3:00 pm. Kirby arrived early, went straight to work assessing the repairs needed and explained everything. Didn't try to oversell anything. He had all the parts I needed and all the tools needed to complete the job in a timely and professional manner. All the charges were explained in the estimate and the final total reflected it. A very professional company with employees that care about the work they do, qualities that are hard to find these days. I will be recommending Precision Door Service and will call on them again in the future.

Our technician Kirby is highly skilled and we are extremely proud of the level of knowledge and professionalism he continuously shows. It takes time and hard work to get to the level Kriby is at, and having your acknowledgement of his efforts is fantastic! So, thank you again, for the five-star review, and thank you for your kind words. Please keep us in mind for any future needs you may have.

name: Jason Odom
text: I would differently get a second opinion on your garage door repair. We had the unfortunate misshape  of our garage door coming off the tracks and needed a repairman ASAP. I called the first guys I found, Precision Door Service. They came out, took 5 minutes to address the problem and tried to convenience us that our garage door was completely shot. Then came the $1500.00 High Pressure Sale. We paid to get the garage door closed and called for a second opinion. I'm glad I did, $120.00 later and my garage door is working perfectly, like new. Buyer Beware

resp.text:
Good afternoon Jason,
I want to apologize if we have made you feel this way. Our technicians do a very thorough inspection of every door and all its moving hardware on the door to make sure they quote and offer you the best options for a long term solution. They also have to consider their own safety when resetting an aged door. Our technician felt that it would be more safe and would provide a long term solution to replace your door after reviewing the condition of the panels, track and torsion springs. Our technicians are passionate about what they do in the field and always strive to bring the best garage door parts and customer service to your doorstep. We greatly appreciate the opportunity to do business and appreciate the feed back.

name: Brittney Stever
text: Kirby Reeves came out to my house to service my garage door. I'm a new home owner and in the first week of owning my home, my garage door suddenly quick working. The learning light would either blink 3 or 4 times. Mainly it would blink 3 times. Since that indicated that it would be either a door switch or a motor problem, I decided to have a technician come out to take a look at it so I know what to do. He deserves 10 stars. Even though he didn't have a door switch since he had just sold his last one, and that was the only thing wrong with mine, he he did what he could to help and teach me on how to fix it myself once I got the part. He helped me fix my remote openers for my car by setting them up, helped me run a wire so I could wire in the switch once it arrives (my old switch was the battery powered one that was known to break when you tried to replace the batteries), told me to take my LED light bulb out because it would ruin my motor eventually, informed me to avoid using LED lights outside my house due them somehow interfere with the remote signals, showed me how to properly oil my door and how frequently it should be done, oiled my door, and told me everything that could potentially go wrong with the door or system and what I should do with each scenario and how to fix it. I would strongly recommend him to another person looking to fix a problem with their garage door. He also takes his time to do it right, very conscientious about not putting unnecessary holes in your walls or get it dirty, and he's very friendly.

resp.text: Brittney, welcome to home ownership! You did the right thing, calling a professional to show you how to maintain your home is the best way learn. We are so glad you called Precision Door Services and allowed Kirby to walk you through the general maintenance of a garage door. It was extremely nice of you to recognize and acknowledge Kirby's professionalism, knowledge and "above and beyond" approach he takes to every job. Thank you for your business and five-star review. If you ever have a need for assistance, please keep Precision Door Service in mind.

name: Joah Norris
text: Wish I could give 0 stars. Their repair guy tried to tell  me my motherboard in the motor was shot and it would cost $500 to replace. Just got my garage door fixed by another company. The problem? 1 bad sensor. Their repair guy NEVER checked the sensor before trying to scam me out of $500.

resp.text:
Hello Mr. Norris,
We had previously tried to come to a resolution on this situation and I am sorry that you feel this way.
In November of 2017 we came out to your home completed a safety inspection in which our technician failed several parts of your door during the safety inspection.  We did not perform any work on your door but our technician did quote you for a new operator and verbally told you you may need a new circuit board. It was strictly a quote in which you decided not to move forward with.  The technician did charge a service fee for coming out, and after you made a compliant in November last year in which you thought our technician did not spend enough time diagnosing the problem we tried to call and apologize and figure out a solution and were hung up on just like we were today. In November we refunded you the $49.95 service call. We absolutely never want anyone to feel like they are being taken advantage of and it is absolutely our policy for our technician fully diagnose a problem and complete a full safety inspection prior to giving a customer a quote. We have spoken to this technician to ensure this type of situation does not happen again.

name: Mary Welch
text:
Our technician - Ross Helwig was very personable, friendly and knowledgeable about our garage door situation.  While we were unable to have the door repaired today - we will be getting a completely new door within a short matter of time which will solve our potentially on-going problems with our existing door.  We are well pleased with the service thus far and look forward to the new door installation!!

name: Dean Lemieux
text:
I initially had called another service on the Eastern Shore.  The guy who answered the phone acted as if I had interrupted his day, and wanted to schedule me for the afternoon of the next day?  I then called Precision Door Service and was immediately scheduled by Miranda for 11 am the same day.  In less than 20 minutes, I was called by Kirby Reeves the service technician who said he could be there in 20 minutes.

Kirby arrived at about 9:30 am same day, handled my repair to the drive belt, and also offered additional recommendations and quotes that he thought I might need.  He handled all the repairs quickly, and professionaly, and even spent time giving me a tutorial lesson on garage door maintenance to help prolong the life of my door and motor system.

This place is A#1 over the other guy I had called, sometimes keeping things local, aren't always your best bet?

I would recommend Precision Door Service to all my friends and anyone else on the Eastern Shore for their prompt, courteous, and above and beyond service to ensure you have, and maintain the best life of your current or new garage door system.  These guys CARE!!!!!

name: Ultreya Park
text: Find another repair company. Beware this company's poor practices and scare tactics, mainly an attempt at a hard upsell once onsite that they call a "safety inspection." The tech they sent basically tried to take advantage of two people with obvious disabilities, including one being elderly. Guy did not bat an eye as he tried to get us to agree to a more expensive thousands-of-dollars job, intending to play on fear. Their tech graphically laid out a possible fatal injury/death scenario if we didn't go with the option of total replacement of the door and old spring loaded system, which worked fine manually for 40 years, and for about 5 years with an electric opener. The tech charged for changing a setting on the door opener that did not require expertise. Upfront deal they offer sounds great, but when I had to point out the promised deal was not given, the tech was not particularly apologetic about the mistake, and tried to act like there was a misunderstanding that was on me, but there wasn't, bc I wrote it down when talking to the office. He did not use his own ladder, which can be a homeowner liability issue. Also balked bc I wanted a written hard copy receipt. Two stars bc they did come promptly, did get it working and did make the price adjustment once insisted, and did send the receipt via mail bc the techs do not have any. Would use another repair person/company.

resp.text:
Ultrey, As it seems you are a company that is paid to write reviews about other companies, 90% of them being bad reviews. This does not sound like anything our company would do. We have confronted every single employee in our company regarding the statements in the review. Due to this not being an actual customer name we cannot find you in our system to rectify the serious statements you are making about our company.
After reviewing your statement we would like to point out a couple of things.
1. We do not condone or practice scam tactics to hard sell customers.
2. Yes, we do provide a safety inspection. This outlines every part of your door and allows you to see what exactly is needed to fix your problem.
3.Multiple options are given and none of which you are obligated to. They range from a temporary fix to a lifetime fix.
4. Our technicians all have ladders which they are required to use, and understand they are not to use customer ladders.
We do NOT operate this way, we treat all customers fair & honest and try to provide the absolute best customer service in the area. Please reach out to us to provide a name so we can take a look at this situation, and remove anyone in our company representing us in this fashion.

name: don wilson
text:
I do not recommend using this company. After getting a quote to replace my back door, it took almost 6 weeks before they could come out to do the work. Then when i left for work, leaving my wife to be there while they finished and to pay them, they tried to double the price I was quoted. Luckily i was able to answer my phone when my wife called about it. After him trying argue about the price for 5 minutes nd him accusing me of trying to cheat him, we got it settled. When i got home the next morning and inspected the work, it was horrible, the outside was unfinished with bare presswood showing on bottom and a 2x4 showing and protruding from the top. The inside looked awful, they had re-used the old trim, after ripping chunks out of it, and cracking it in multiple places. Also the door was not squared up at all so the trim did not fit back together right. And finally left all their trash and old stuff they removed piled in my yard, along with a lot of new and old nails and screws scattered everywhere over my steps, patio, and in my yard. All in all a total rip off.  If you do decide to use these guys, make sure you get everything in writing up front, the quote, exactly what they agree to do, and perform a thorough inspection before paying.

In the pictures below you can see what condition they left everything in. Note: the bottom of the door, i applied sealant because it was suppose to rain that day before i could get the presswood covered up.

Cost was $400 to replace torsion bar / spring with 5 year parts / 1 year warranty - not transferable to buyer if I sell the house.

text: Great company the tech was very friendly came and got the job done asap!.. I recommend this company

name: Ken Chaney
text:
I called this company at 9 am in the morning in the hopes that they could repair our garage door the same day possibly. I had called several other companies and was told next day was soonest.
When I called Precision I spoke with Kaitlyn she was very accommodating and pleasant on the phone and told me she could have someone out between 2 and 4 pm. She took my email, sent my appointment information to me promptly.  An hour later I received a call from Jeremy telling me he was only 15 minutes away and he asked if it would be a bother to come early. I said absolutely, please by all means come over.
He arrived, came inside, acknowledged my two pups then went out to the garage to diagnose the issue. It was the sprocket in the top of the opener itself. And we didn’t know it but the spring that was installed, was replaced twice by another company within the last five years because it was the incorrect spring that they had replaced it with. It wasn’t near strong enough to support the garage door.  That was the first company that that I had called today to check if they could come today.
He quickly gave me an estimate and had the parts in his truck to fix it and I gave him the ok to repair.  To my astonishment, he was done in about an hour AND my garage door has never been this quiet.  Jeremy was very pleasant and accommodating. I give five stars to this company and they have gained a new lifetime customer. Don’t even think of calling another company if you need overhead door replacement!   Thank you Precision!

Explained what the process would be, and worked very professionally. He answered any questions that I had in advance. He also made sure the entire work area was swept up so no loose screws were on the garage floor. I will definitely recommend Precision Door to anyone who asks.

text: Had two issues with two different doors.  Both were taken care of in a timely fashion and both doors work more smoothly than they have in years.

text: These guys were great.  They helped me select the right door when I needed it.  I first used them for a repair last fall.  They responded quickly and professionally. text:
Paul with Precision Door Service took time to truly fix our garage door. He explained what he was doing at each step, was a very fair price and I cannot say enough about his pride in his work.

We had the company that installed it 5 years ago come out last year and they just shifted the problem to the other side and Paul took the time to get it working better than it ever has.

Hands down who we will call for any garage door needs!

name: Tim Crump
text: I have dealt with this company once, I couldn't have been more impressed. They were prompt, professional and courteous. They immediately recognized the problem and had it fixed within 15 minutes. It's easy to understand why they have an A+ rating with the BBB.

text: I am pleased with the price and the decision Precision Technician Jeremy help me with very nice, employee Jeff thank you.

name: Thomas Kopec
text: I had a great experience with this company. I called them Tuesday afternoon and was able to schedule service Wednesday afternoon. The technician met me at the house and was patient as I had to get my baby from the car to inside and in the crib for a nap. He went over everything with me before getting started, and then the work only took about 30 minutes. He replaced the broken tension rod above the garage door and answered my questions. Total cost was around. $238 with an online coupon, a little pricey but after contacting a competitor that seems to be close to the going rate. I was very pleased all around with my experience and highly recocmmend.

name: Andrew Sullivan
text: This company doesn't mind screwing over its clients. I got charged $169 for a $12 dollar part to be replaced. They charge $69 just to give you a quote, so at that point if you choose to go with another company you're out the money. I understand a mark-up and I'm paying for labor but 1400% is a littles excessive especially for 30-minutes worth of work. Please stay away from this company! I have talked to people since this experience that had their whole garage motor system replaced for less than $200!

name: S.A. Frazier
text: Great customer service the tech came out give me some pointers on my problem. Now my garage door works great!

text: Great service. Had to have springs replaced because it had broken. In and out in two hours.

name: Adam West
text: I called them and they had an appointment scheduled for us right away with a lot of options for us to choose from so it allowed us to be able to work with our schedules to be here. Their technician, Martin who was super friendly, called right on the dot at the time of their scheduled time frame and told me exactly when he would be here and arrived at that time. Once here, the tech looked over everything, gave me several options to choose from and even gave great suggestions on what I really need and didn't need. Never at any time did I feel like they were trying to sell me on upgrades and repairs I didn't need. The tech was in and out with our repair in less than an hour and even went the extra mile in a few places to make sure it was looking new. The price was a little higher than I wanted but I am also a firm believer in you get what you pay for. The springs are wonderful and even had a coated to help them last unlike the factory ones we had. I would even dare say it is much quieter! Any of issues and we will be calling back again.

name: Tim Calhoun
text:
I had a broken chain repaired today, and Paul did a great job. He was scheduled to arrive between 12-2, and he was here at 11:30. He quickly diagnosed the problem (why he thought the chain broke), completed the repair to his standard (replaced the whole track and chain), and even inspected my other garage door to make sure I wouldn't have a repeat issue with that door.
He was efficient, friendly, answered all questions, and explained his work. And, since I was using Precision as an "out of network" contractor through my home warranty company, he even spoke with the warranty company to explain the work to ensure they would reimburse me for the work. I would easily recommend Precision Door Service and Paul to any of my friends and family.
Great job today, Paul! Oh, and thanks for buying some of my daughter's Girl Scout cookies, too! HA!

name: Valerie Edelmann
text: Absolutely the BEST customer service for any company I've EVER dealt with. Called because garage door spring broke on Friday or Saturday. Their voicemail said they would be out over New Year's holiday until Jan 2.(Weds) On Monday I got a call from Charlene saying she was just checking messages and they could come out on Weds. We had dr. appts on Weds. So Thursday was it. She had to send someone to diagnose first so she could contact the warranty people for authorization. Home warranty company was ridiculous to try to reach. Charlene reached them. Got the payment issues taken care of and called me right away on Friday. Nick and Brian came out Friday and fixed it quickly. Very fair price for what wasn't completely covered. Very nice young men who came out to install and fantastic young lady handling, scheduling, warranty, etc. THANK YOU Charlene, Nick and Brandon!!

name: norman scheurich
text:
Disappointing response.  Left my info on the website requesting a quote for a broken spring.  Provided the size of my door (8x8') and received a call back the next day with an estimate of $225.  Appointment scheduled and was told the tech would call when they were 30 minutes away. The tech arrived the next day (without the call) and said they do not carry the size of the spring I needed for a 8' door, only 7'.  They could order one, but the cost would be more than $450.
Called Wilson garage door company and they also do not carry the springs for the 8' door, but would convert it to the newer torsion bar for $225-250.  Service scheduled.
I did receive a call from the owner after the post attempting to make it right by discounting the price.  He explained they have been overwhelmed by the ice storm and did not carry the 8' extension springs.

Hello Mr. Scheurich,

Upon receiving your review, we immediately checked our records so we could investigate the issue. We made an error on the scheduling and handling of your service call. Again, we apologize for any inconveniences we may have caused. Warm regards, Jerry

text: We had a spring break and I thought I'd just google it and knock it out myself but the more I researched my gut kept telling  me to call for help and I'm glad that for once I listened . resp.text:
Hello Joe. Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. It means so much when our customers share their experiences.

Your story is one rarely told in our review section; thank you for sharing that with us and others here on Google! It's wonderful that your garage door spring repair experience has made such a difference for you. Broken springs can be very dangerous.

Research by the National Electronic Injury Surveillance System shows that an average of more than 10,500 people suffers from injuries by their garage doors per year. The sizeable amount means that people should avoid opting for certain garage door DIY repairs. Spring systems exert extreme tension, which many people may have trouble understanding. For this reason, it’s best to put the task of repairing and installing garage door springs in the hands of a garage door professional. We aren't saying it can't  be done by the consumer, but we do our best to educate accidents like head injuries, lacerations,  and broken wrists and fingers occur due to a lack of proper training and the use of incorrect tools. Sadly, in some cases even death.

We are sure Scotty enjoyed every moment of your garage door spring repair.

Thank you again for your review and your business. We are glad we were able to meet your expectations.

- The Staff of Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama™

Dan was professional and courteous and completed the job quickly.  He showed me how to maintain the garage door components and lubricated both garage doors while he was here.  Both garage doors are now extremely quiet and operate smoothly.  I highly recommend this company to anyone who has any issues with their garage door! Thank you Dan!

resp.text: Hello Heath. - Thank you so much for this great Google 5-Star Review. We really appreciate you taking the time to leave us your feedback and for helping to share the word about us. Our company values and our company staff place customer satisfaction as a top priority. Dan, alongside every member of our Overhead Door™ team, proudly work together to offer the best in quality garage door products and services. We are so pleased to see this reflected on our visit to your home. Thank you for your business. - The Staff of Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama™

name: Michael Miller
text:
I messed up our garage door and  needed help fast.  The other suppliers I called thought 3 weeks would be ok - but it was most certainly not in this case.  I called the Overhead Door Company of Huntsville and explained my dilemma.   I had a person come look at it Monday evening and on Tuesday afternoon I had Dakota, Damon and Shaun on the job.

They were very professional organized and knowledgeable and it showed through the whole process.  The level of craftsmanship was superb and there were no shortcuts taken.  The finished product spoke for itself and the team took the time to give me tips on keeping it in good shape for years to come.  If you need a door, at a highly competitive price and with top shelf workmanship this is the place.   I was not only pleasantly surprised - but plainly shocked at the level of quality all the way through.  Thank you all who had a part in this.

resp.text: Hello Michael.  What an excellent review for Dakota, Damon, and Shawn. We are so pleased Travis was able to work with you on Monday evening to get you a new garage door installed the following day.  We appreciate you taking the time to write this Google 5-Star Review. It's customers like you that continue to allow Overhead Door Company of Huntsville™ to thrive in the North Alabama area. Being locally owned and operated, word of mouth and online reviews are our lifelines. Gone are the days of the Yellow Pages; online reviews are how 95% of our customers find us. The Overhead Door Company™ makes a fantastic line of garage door products. We are lucky to be the only North Alabama distributor for such a trustworthy brand. We always carry a vast stock of inventory to help accommodate situations such as yours.  Thanks again for your business and review. The Staff of Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama™

name: Albert Bosse
text: I've been a customer of Overhead Door Company of North Alabama since 2012. I called about a broken spring (which also caused a broken opener). Despite the severe weather, I was able to get a service appointment 2 days later. Scotty D. arrived and completed a long list of tasks: replace broken spring, replace opener with a nice Overhead Door Legacy 850 belt drive unit with wi-fi that I highly recommend, replaced cables, replaced bottom door seal, and performed maintenance and lubrication. All done in under 2.5 hours. Scotty D. was professional, courteous, set up all remotes and keypad, and explained all that I need to know.

resp.text:
Hello Albert. Thanks so kindly for taking the time to write such a fantastic review for Overhead Door Company of Huntsville™. We appreciate your patience during our recent "southern" weather issues. We want to begin with a huge thank you for your continued business since 2012. Being locally owned and operated, online reviews play a huge part in the continued success of our business. Hearing from our repeat customers is extra special for us.

The Legacy 850 is a great garage door opener! Quickly and accurately servicing our customer's garage door is always a goal for Overhead Door™, and hearing we lived up to that goal is very encouraging. Scotty is exactly as you described. He has a passion for assisting our customers and he's packed with knowledge. We are proud to have him on our team.

Thanks again for calling us for all of your garage door services. Wishing you great week ahead. - The Staff of Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama™

text: I seldom follow up if I don't put a review out there at the time (which sad to say I often fail to do), but this company 100% deserves the solid reviews it has. I was worried it would take a long time, but I called in the late afternoon, and they apologized they couldn't get here until the next morning. Scotty had all of the tools and materials needed, and knocked out the spring replacement in no time. He mentioned the opener itself was likely going out. He guessed it's approximate age correctly and said it likely contributed to the spring going out (when I tried to tighter the chain). He later showed me where the sprocket was coming apart. Point is he asked if I'd like a new unit and gave me a deal and said he could knock it out in just a bit more time. Threw in a keypad as well. It fixed some other issues we were just living with (e.g., non-functional light), and the whole thing now is sooooo much quieter and nicer. This is one of the top companies we've ever dealt with. Scotty was both professional and personally relatable, wasn't slowed down one bit and we are extremely satisfied.

resp.text: Hello Mandi. First of all, thank you so much for your positive feedback and for taking the time to post this Google 5-Star Review. name: Craig Dry
text: Great Service! I called last night when my garage door spring broke. Dan came out promptly at noon for our 12-4pm appointment window.  He was personable, knowledgeable, and efficient.  He had my springs replaced and my door working in no time.  Made it look so easy, but I know it's not easy because one slip and those powerful springs could change everything. Thank you for getting me back up in no time!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Craig. We are so happy our visit to your home and the garage door spring(s) replacement went wonderfully for you. Dan is an amazing technician! We do appreciate his mention in your comment and Google 5-Star Review. You are so correct .... "one slip and those powerful springs could change everything." A garage door torsion spring uses basics physics to function and operate.  Mechanical energy is stored as the springs are tightened and twisted.  They are mounted above the opening of your garage door so as the garage door goes down, the cables will make the spring wind up to move the garage door system. The same sort of action occurs when you open your garage door – the springs will unwind to allow the cables to lift the heavy door open. This winding and unwinding causes the springs to weaken over time. People will either see signs of wear on their springs and try to perform a replacement themselves, or the spring will snap while in use, causing tremendous damage. Garage door springs can last anywhere between five to seven years with average garage door use, so they do not need to be replaced often. But when it is time to replace springs, it is important to call a professional technician who has the tools and the skills to accomplish the task without causing damage to property or people. We are so glad you called us of your garage door services. Thanks again for your business. - The Staff of Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama™

text: I had a strange experience with this company. Our garage door openers broke down. I wanted to replace them with Chamberlain RJO openers that require the torsion bar drums to not be reverse wound. This would involve switching around the drums and replacing the torsion springs. I called and spoke to the receptionist at the company who promised that we would get a call back from one of the service technicians. We never heard back. I called back the next day and spoke to Travis on the phone. I explained what we needed done. He didn't seem to understand what the RJO openers were. His response was quite rude. Among other things, and I quote "well, we're going to have to switch the drums and the springs and it's going to be a lot of work", and "how is all this going to help your opener open the doors?, and "we'd like you to call someone else". From all the other excellent reviews it seems like they're good when they can sell you doors or openers or other equipment, but they didn't seem very interested in coming to look at what needed to be done at our place.

He was nice, knowledgeable, and professional. Exceeded my expectations... will continue using them in the future. Thanks Dan and ODC!

You won’t find his name in history books, but Overhead Door Corporation’s founder, C. G. Johnson, invented the upward-lifting garage door in 1921 and the electric garage door opener in 1926. For over 95 years, the Overhead Door™ brand has stood for product quality and expertise, as well as professional service. We want to thank you for calling us for your garage door services! I would recommend Overhead Door as a company and Dan as a service tech.

I had attempted to put on a seal on the bottom, but due to the design, I was having some issues which caused the cable to come off.  Dan put on a new bottom seal and put the lift cable back on.  He completed his work quickly.  The great thing was I called that morning and he was able to come out that afternoon, so I did not have to leave my garage door open overnight.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Walter. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us and others - and we agree, Dan is truly a gem to have on our team. We count ourselves lucky for customers like you. We appreciate your business. Wishing you a great day. - The staff of Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama™

text: Dan did an excellent job with replacing the spring on our garage door this afternoon in this oppressive heat.  I will definitely use this company again as I have in the past.

We would like to thank you so much for your positive feedback and for taking the time to post this Google 5-Star Review. It's our customers that allow us to constantly improve the way we do business. It's also our customer base that makes our business continue to grow. We understand that times like these can be stressful, and we are so glad Dan was able to get your spring replaced and your garage door up and moving quickly and effectively for you. Thanks again for your business. - The Staff of Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama™

name: Deborah Alexander
text: I was very impressed by the service that Dan provided as a representative of Overhead Door Company on Monday, November 12, 2018.  For a week, my garage door would only go partially open or closed and then would stop.  I would routinely have to hold down the button on the wall to force it open or closed.  I finally called to have it checked, and the first company that I called said that they would send someone out the next day.  I then called Overhead Door Company, and they said that they would send a representative out THAT DAY and that he/she would call before arriving.  I called for help at about 8:30 AM, and Dan came to help me at around 11:00 AM...only 2 1/2 hours later!  While Dan did help me to learn about the newer options available to me in case he was not able to fix my problem, he did not try to upsell me to a bigger, better model but was able to fix my problem with his knowledge alone.  What he did is ensure that I will call Overhead Door Company with any future issues and inevitably buy a replacement for my 10-year old garage door opener motor from them, when necessary.  I also have parents and a brother in the area, both with houses with 5+ year old garage door openers.  I will tell them about this great experience and encourage them to use Overhead Door Company, as well.

resp.text: Hello Deborah. First of all, thank you so much for your kind detailed feedback and taking the time to post this review. For us, it's our customers that allow us to constantly improve the way we do business, one of which Overhead Door™ has worked hard, locally, for over 50+ years to provide. We are especially proud when we see the mention of one of our technicians, in this case, Dan, and the reflection of his honesty. We are pleased he was able to make the repair of your garage door motor.  We made sure Dan received the recognition he deserved.  Once again, thank you so much for taking the time to tell us and others about your experience with Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama™. If you ever need help with your garage door in the future, we hope you won't hesitate to give us a call. Thanks for your mention to your parents and brother... ! We don't wish them garage door troubles, but we are happy to know that you have given them a good referral.  Wishing you a wonderful holiday season. - The Staff of Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama™

He was exceptionally personable, very knowledgeable, explained everything very clearly, had the repairs done very quickly, and recommended maintenance I could perform to keep the door working properly. name: Roger Howard
text:
DG and WC came on 3/21 to install my new garage door and opener.  My previous door was damaged in a mishap on 3/16.  DG came out on 3/18 and allowed me to get my wife's van out of the garage because the door would not open.  Unfortunately, that door was so old that no parts could be replaced.  But , the new door and opener were installed and totally functional in about 2 hours.  Both installers were cordial and I could tell that both enjoyed their work.  Had my door frame been in much better shape, I have no doubt the job would have gone much quicker.  I was left with a good explanation of how to operate and maintain the door and opener.   I recommend Overhead Door Company of Huntsville for any service  needed for your garage door needs.

Roger

name: Brian
text: Came home one afternoon to see that my neighbor had gotten a new garage door which looked fantastic.  Mine was a mess so I figured out Overhead Door did theirs, and so I gave them a call.  Glad I did.  Sales guy was able to come out pretty quick to give me a quote and talk about options.  I selected a Thermacore door since my garage is really my laundry and home gym and the insulation will help to keep it warmer.  Even though the Thermacores have to be custom ordered, barely a month went by between signing the contract and install, and the holidays were smack dab in the middle of that month.  Dakota and Shawn came by yesterday to install and they did a fantastic job.  They were punctual, polite and professional, and explained the door maintenance with me.  They were also blazing fast.  I already had installed an opener a while ago and it only took them about an hour and a half to clear out my old junk door and get the new one in.  The new door looks great and doesn't sound like an old wooden roller-coaster like my old door.  Very happy with this company and their employees.

resp.text: Hello Brian. Thanks so kindly for leaving us such a wonderful Google 5-Star Review and the mention of Mitchell, Dakota and Shawn. We are glad that you were happy with our services! Our dedicated staff will be pleased to learn of your high praise. Thank you for entrusting Overhead Door™ with the purchase of your new Thermacore® garage door and its installation. You chose an amazing door! It will be perfect for your garage setup – gym and laundry!  So many people are now using their garage space for additional usable living space. We are certain you will be pleased with your decision with your garage door selection. We are fortunate to be part of a 450+ strong Overhead Door Company™ Distributorship.  A little trivia: The Overhead Door™ created the first upward-acting door in 1921 and the first electric garage door opener in 1926. Overhead Door Company of Huntsville™ has been in the Huntsville area for over 50+ years. We are so pleased that you chose us for your garage door needs. You can thank you neighbor for us too. Thanks again for calling us. Let us know if you have any questions or concerns. - The Staff of Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama™

name: G B
text: Matt did a great job diagnosing my garage door issue, and explained how the age of it made it more likely to give trouble in the future. Given that, he was ready to service it and get it to go a little further. He then mentioned he had new motors with him on his truck, and could install one. name: Beau Simpson
text:
Don’t trust the good reviews,  I question the authenticity...Bad customer service and unwilling to resolve mistakes miss by sales rep. I would not recommend.

Wasted 4 hours of my day and ended up with the my original broken garage door back on.

Very dissatisfied. I Really suggest folks review the “lowest” rating reviews on here...

Response to owners response below:

You are still missing it, the customer service (the owner) response to errors/mistakes made was the issue. To be clear, the workers were great and did excellent work.

The issue is, they made a mistake thinking they could use a standard garage door. I’m not the expert, that’s why I hired your company. Unfortunately, the standard door, left a 2 in gap at the bottom (fully across the bottom), not fully closing.

The response should have been, we will make this right for you, however that was far from the response I received. In fact I was pretty much blamed at the issue being my fault, somewhat comical.

The response I received was, pay for the door in full ($775) with the 2in gap at the bottom and overhead door will order a custom door and I’ll (the customer) pay the additional fee after installation OR we will remove the newly installed door and put back the old broken door...sort an ultimatum- seriously.

I was willing to pay 50% ($387.50) to leave the standard garage door (with 2in gap at the bottom) to allow time for overhead door to order and install the custom door then fit the remaining bill once complete. This would have also provided my tenants with a working garage door. However I was told by overhead door that offer was unreasonable and I needed to pay in full or they will take down the entire door...oh and btw if after I paid for the incorrectly installed door, it somehow gets damaged while I’m waiting on the custom door, I’m fully liable. Real nice customer service policy.

So, in true customer service fashion, overhead door would rather leave you hanging with old broken garage door even if the mistake is on their end.

Again - it’s my personal opinion and experience to not go with overhead door in Madison AL.

resp.text:
Mr. Simpson,

We would like to begin by apologizing for your inconvenience.

The concrete floor of the garage at your rental property is unlevel. This became more evident when the new garage door was installed. We are sorry for the miscommunication regarding the extent to which the new door would seal to your floor.

In regards to your questioning the authenticity of any of our Google reviews, we would invite you to contact any of our listed customers or Google itself to validate they are each genuine.

We welcome any reviews, good or bad. We take the defamation of our character and good name very serious.

Again, we apologize for any troubles that were caused.

Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama™

Was able to replace both openers right then and within an hour and half we were back in business with doors opening again. Dan was proficient and very friendly.

name: Gary Smith
text: Garage doors are one of the many conveniences we take for granted until they are in disrepair. The extension spring on my wife's door broke during the night and knowing that a storm was expected following afternoon about the time of her return. I called at lunch and within an hour Dan called back to let me know he was on the way.  He was very personable and professional. He explained what he expected to find and the gave an accurate estimate that I confirmed.  He got to work immediately and within a few minutes the repair was complete and service both garage doors and showed me how to maintain. If you need new or garage doors serviced, give these guys a call.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Gary. You are so right! Garage doors are a convenience that many of us do take for granted. The extension springs can be so dangerous to replace. We so often learn of injuries from customers trying to make this repair themselves. We're so happy our visit to your home and the repair service by Dan went wonderfully for both you and your wife. Please know how grateful we are for your support with our highest appreciation for your kindness. Thanks again for calling Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama™.

name: Steve Mccully
text:
The installer was having issues and called for tech support which is obviously not approved of by the company.  The owner called and was very unprofessional to the tech who was just trying  to do his job.
The owner then proceeded to address me in a very unprofessional manner because I wanted him to know that the tech was doing a good job. I've never been talked to like this in my life and guarantee he wouldn't have said it to my face. I hung up on this idiot and called Wilson who has been great and gets a lot of business because of him.

resp.text:
Reported to Google 03-26-19
This consumer is not a customer of ours.

Reported to Google 12-15-18
We did NOT service this consumer.
Mr. Mccully,

We would like to offer our apology for the services that were rendered by "a company" on your garage door or doors.  We have reviewed all of our work orders  and find no record of providing any services in your name.

We have a wonderful staff here at Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama™ and each are treated with great respect. Reading this review has actually  placed each of us on edge because we would never treat a customer in this way,  nor an employee.

There are several other companies with the "Overhead Door" name, but none carry the registered trademark (™)  as us. We are the only authorized Overhead Door™ Brand dealer in North Alabama, but yet many use the name "Overhead Door" but are not trademarked.  These other companies do offer services and doors, but not the "Overhead Door™" brand. This is very confusing to many consumers. They do not carry our brand, yet they use the brand in their titles. We are The Genuine. The Original. Overhead Door™ - Since 1921.

We would like to request that you check your records and name of the garage door company that may have provided these actions towards you and a technician. This is true, there is no excuse for this type of behavior from any company.

Please contact our Service Manager, Travis Cryer,  256-616-1160 to discuss this further. We would like to request you remove this review upon your verification of this being the wrong company. We truly hope you   can understand how important this is to us to get this issue resolved. Our entire company works very hard, and we feel this review was given to us by an honest mistake.

Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama
256-772-3674
