name: F Lynn
text: On Feb 23rd I stopped at this location to ask if they had garage door seals for some Overhead garage doors that were installed in the early to mid-90's. I was told that they were out of it and that I should call back in a week to see if they had some more. Then I was offered a different type of seal that was mounted to a metal plate. They were going to cost me $55 each, or if I had them installed it would cost a total of $250. I decided to pass. I then went to American Overhead Door and they sold me the original type of garage door seal for a total of $50, plus the gentleman gave me some helpful tips for installation.

resp.text: We apologize for being out of stock on the seal that you requested on February 23, 2018.  It's fantastic that you were able to locate the part and make the repairs with no trouble.

name: Kent Schroeder
text:
The torsion spring on our ten year old garage door broke yesterday afternoon. Wife called Overhead Door yesterday and they put us on the calendar for “tomorrow morning”. Dan called this morning and came to our rescue about fifteen minutes later. Our dogs were just as glad to see him as we were. Door was fixed within about a half hour and he showed me where I botched the installation of our garage door opener - and fixed it!
Now the garage door works quieter than before, life is good. If you have a similar problem, just call Overhead Door of Huntsville and ask for Dan.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind review and comment. We always enjoy a "dog lover" too! :) This is so nice of you to write such a wonderful review for Overhead Door Company of Huntsville/North Alabama. We will pass along your positive feedback to Dan and our staff. Thanks again. Give your dog a pat on the head from all of us from Overhead Door.

name: Jessica Martin
text:
HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. They came out to repair a spring that was broken. The tech (who was nice) fixed the spring and had to reprogram the motor. Once he left, I closed my garage door. Well as soon as the door closes, it immediately opens again. It won't stay closed and it NEVER did that until after they were at my house. I called the office to get them back out to fix it because it didn't do that before. The rude woman in the office (Kelsey I think) was absolutely no help. She said that it's possible that we'd have to pay another $85 service fee just for them coming to my house but couldn't tell me for sure without seeing what was wrong. Look, I completely understand that policy. However, the fact that my door was messing up right after the tech left should automatically mean that the service fee is waived. What it seems to me is that this company is dishonest and will milk you for every $85 they can. I would never recommend this company solely based on the lack of integrity and no desire to have a good reputation. I will definitely make sure I tell all of my family, friends, my whole neighborhood  (since I'm on the HOA board) and both of my children's school PTAs not to use this company. All because they are so greedy to get another $85. Very bad business. My next review is with the BBB.

UPDATE:
A few days ago, I received a call from Jerry (either the manager or owner). I didn't speak with him because I decided to have my husband handle all communication with the company after I spoke with the woman in the office who was intolerable. I told him to call the next day to speak with my husband. I believe he did call and we missed it. My husband planned on calling him back on his day off. I received a refund in the mail today for the full amount we paid. It was unexpected and very appreciated. Even though we have not spoken with Jerry yet, I find that to be an exceptional gesture. He clearly knows how to conduct good business and cares about the company's reputation. I hope his approach trickles down to Kelsey in the office. I also want to add that Claire, who was the first woman I spoke with to make my initial appointment, was incredibly nice and helpful.

text: I had to create an account just to leave a review about what Summer O'neal posted below about the door doctors. text: Great work, professional job. Did total replacement of garage system, no problems!

name: Summer O'Neal
text: I hate leaving negative reviews, but Door Doctors has been one of the worst companies we have ever dealt with.  They installed a garage door that is faulty.  Many times when you hit the button to open the door, it doesn't go all the way up.  Because you can't see this when you are in the car, we have backed in to it several times (damaging our vehicles).  We have asked Door Doctors to come fix their faulty door repeatedly.  They did come once but couldn't figure out how to repair it and now they won't come back.  We have taken pictures to show them the problem.  Because they installed a faulty door, they should stand behind their product and replace it.  It has been such a disappointing experience.  I would stay far away from Door Doctors.

text: These people have been nothing but great for us and our company, installing doors, locks, security keypads, and servicing them for over 10 years. We love these guys and will use them again and again! I don't know where the 1 star review came from, but that is certainly NOT the quality of service you get with this fine company.

When you have a small business, I imagine several things are happening at once.. Love to browse in the store & alway find something I like for myself or a gift.  I believe in supporting small businesses.  It gives competition to the big box stores and helps control prices!!

text: Went to Martin door there was a lady talking to a man behind the counter I waited for her to finish talking .When she left and walked to the back the older man behind the counter wouldn't even look a me or my wife he even went so far as to turn his back to us as if we weren't even there .I had planned to purchase Windows for my whole house but since they didn't want to acknowledge us at all I will buy from someone else that wants my money.

text: This is an excellent company! We highly recommend them! Our garage door malfunctioned and both our cars were inside. They provided quick, professional service at a great price!

text: Tension spring broke on garage door suddenly, trapping us in our garage. Owner came out on the same day to get us out of the garage, and a tech came out the next day to replace the older cheaper setup with a new one with a ten year warranty. Price was better than expected as well!

text: This is an owner operated business with a couple more employees. I have used them twice and when i say the professionalism and cost was exceptional. I wouldn't use any other Garage Door Company. A lot of years of experience and very knowledgeable about their job.

name: Neka Neka
text: Sunday morning we was about to leave our house & the garage door wouldn't open. I did some digging around and I ran across Affordable Garage Repair. I called them on a Monday afternoon and immediately spoke w/someone & told them what was going on. Brian came to my house gave a free estimate and explained everything to me. He was professional, fast and friendly. He also had the equipment with him so I didn't have to wait until the next day or days after. He fixed my garage door in about 45 minutes to 1hour and gave me some pointers and I even got a 10 year warranty as well. I'm super happy I gave  them a call. I definitely will use this company again , if I need to in the future.

name: Gerald Nix
text: Quick response, honest and up front about what repairs are needed. Took care of some other maintenance as well after replacing both springs. Definitely recommended.

name: Karen Furlong
text: Brian Danner repaired my garage door. From the time he came to my front door, he was courteous, polite and respectful. He came after regular working hours to meet my needs and gave quality service after quickly diagnosing the issue and inspection of the problem. He was personable and gave me some helpful suggestions relative to my garage door. I would give this manager and company a top notch rating and recommendation.

name: Mike Who
text: EXCELLENT! I called and Mr Robert was on scene immediately. He was friendly, neat, and well organized. Super nice guy. Had me back up in less than an hour!

text: Talked with them over the phone about a powering issue and it was the most helpful customer service experience I’ve ever had. I definitely recommend giving them a call for services.

If you need a company that is honest & caring call Affordable Garage Door Repair Specialist....you won't be disappointed! We truly appreciate you!

text: Brian arrived in a timely manner, took time to explain what was wrong and repaired it within an hour. The customer service was very good and I’d recommend this company for anyone needing garbage repair. I’m not sure how “affordable” it was at 325.00 but I didn’t mind paying that for quality work.

name: George Beaudry
text: I called the office at 0930 and within 30 minutes Brian (the technician) called and said he would be at the house within a  couple of hours as he was on another job. I couldn’t be home when he came but he explained to my wife in detail the problem (broken spring) and the fix. She called me on speaker and he was more than willing to explain it again, he and I also discussed a minor repair to a broken bracket that I was aware of, Brian added a bit of rebar to strengthen my prior repair at no charge. We also discussed a few maintenance issues for the future which I will definitely call Affordable Garage Door to handle when the time comes. Thank you Brian!

Brian took time to diagnose the problem and provided  several options to resolve the issue with our garage door. Brian was extremely thorough, efficient and punctual... making sure everything was in tip top order. We can't say enough about the customer service we received, impeccable!!
By the way, the owner was able to schedule an appointment for me on a Saturday, very accommodating. Thank you.

name: Jeager 01
text: Called to set up a date for roll up door repair. I got quick response and service

name: FeLishia Franklin
text:
Great service!! Great customer service! Prompt!
My garage door went off track on Friday morning. I was having surgery that day and it was later in the day before I could look for, make any calls for, or google a company. When I looked up Home Advisor and submitted my info, Affordable Garage Door Repair Specialist called. I sent a picture via text, and they gave me a time for the next day. The repairman was awesome. The owner was awesome. I love great customer service. My garage door is better than before! I have a 90 day warranty if I need it and they really were affordable. To top it off, they accept several payment methods to include cashapp. Which is perfect if you don’t want to give your card info over the phone. I highly recommend this company!

FeLishia Franklin

text: Stephen did a fantastic job at repairing my garage door where the rollers were barely holding on the track.  Stephen came on a weekend which was a definite plus for me to have someone to come out on the weekend and repair the garage door.  I would definitely recommend Affordable Garage Door Repair to anyone.

text: Great service from everyone involved! I had problems with another garage door repair service and I called them and they got a technician out to look at my door in a couple hours. The technicians were very knowledgeable and showed me my issues and told me what they were going to do to fix it. They make you feel involved in the process which gave me peace of mind and told me that they really know what they are doing. They seem to really care for their customers and make sure they fix it right the first time. I will definitely use them again in the future if needed.

name: Susan Manger
text: Robert Miller is awesome! He came to my house and replaced my broken spring on my garage door less than two hours after I got off work. He was very courteous, professional and reasonable in price! I highly recommend this company and ask for Robert.

name: Wendy Jacobsen
text: After our son accidentally left his toy sword in the railing of the garage door, the door was so bent up and crooked we thought for sure we'd have to replace it. Brian fixed it easily, saving us lots of money, and it runs better than before! We are so relieved and grateful.

text: Brian did a great job. He has a lot of knowledge and experience. He pinpointed the problems and took care of them. When the time comes for a new garage door I will be calling Brian.

Brian was highly knowledgeable about the operations of my garage and within one hour, he had my door fixed and working better than it ever has. I highly recommend this company to everyone.

text: We live in Pike Road, Alabama. I woke Saturday morning and my garage door springs had broken and I called all over until I found this company. He was great and very professional!! Everything was fixed in 30 minutes or less. Thank you Robert!!!!!

text: Robert, the owner, is a very honest, impressive young man.  He came out tonight well after dark to fix our garage door when we couldn't get our car out at all.  He had the correct parts on hand & did an excellent job.  He could have easily put us off until tomorrow, but he's conscientious & dependable.   My husband & I would recommend him highly.

name: christine oliver
text:
Excellent, caring service.
Robert will get the job done ✅
You are in good hands
Call them and you will be more than satisfied

name: Linda Waldrop
text: I just wanna say to anyone in need of a new garage door or just need someone to repair your old one ,then You should call Affordable Garage Door Repair Specialist.We had a great experience with this company from start to finish.we had a problem with our door on a late Sunday night ,we called almost every other company but got no answer and no call back from any of them except for Robert Williamson's company.they not only were concerned with our dilemma of having all of our valuables exposed but they were prompt,courteous,Knowledgeable and had a fair price..A short time later another company with a similar name  called back called us back with higher pricing per hour ,and were short and couldn't guaranty a specific time to arrive and couldn't promise that they could even repair it ,It was painfully obvious that there only concern was with selling me a brand new door which I did not need.Robert and his staff are the Epitomy of how business should be conducted

name: Kathy Jones
text: I called Affordable and they came out the same day to repair my garage. Robert, the Tech was awesome, he was vey knowledgeable, and explained what he had to do in order to get the door woking. We were satisfied customers when the tech finished. Need repairs on your garage call Robert at Affordable Garage in Montgomery, you will be glad you did.

name: Herbert Hunter
text:
The owner, Robert Williamson, answered my call. He had 3 customers ahead of me on a Saturday but promised to come out between 1500 & 1600 hours. I had a broken spring that was only 5 years old. I texted my address and a picture of the broken spring and the garage door motor. Robert & Steve (his technician) arrived at 1530 hrs and assessed the issue. They had all of the replacement parts with them. Robert gave me useful advice and options that saved me money. For example, instead of two springs we agreed a single spring would provide the best option and saved money. He continued to provide safety tips, remedies for the screeching noises and a 10 year warranty. You can likely guess by now that I’m a retired military veteran. Yes, Mr. Williamson’s company honors the military with a discount. I’m truly thankful for the prompt response, quality work and fair price.

Thanks Robert & Steve.....Herb JR.

name: Jamaal Smith
text: Great Service and awesome people. Robert was great. Will definitely recommend them

name: Patriot4Life
text:
Contacted Affordable Garage Door Repair Specialist on 23 Sep 2020 after hours to replace tensioner springs and rollers on my garage door. The next morning Rob and Stephen showed up and completed the job in a timely and professional manner.

Pricing with 10 year warranty on tensioner and rollers are unbeatable, in my opinion.

Military discounts are another rare bonus, that most businesses fail to support or acknowledge these days. appreciated there customer service  and Veterans Support

I would highly and confidently recommend Affordable Garage Door Repair Specialist to anyone in need of services.

name: a b
text: Mr. Williamson was so kind and helpful. He offered to come out on Sunday to get my door working. He was at my house Monday morning at the time he stated, and had my door fixed promptly. He prices were extremely reasonable. He will definitely be my go to for garage door repairs in the future!

name: Glenn Chesnutt
text:
Service was prompt and courteous. The door was not repaired properly and would not work at all when he left. Cost was considerably higher than others for similar service. When I called him within an hour of leaving to tell him the door still would not work, he said he was so busy he could not possibly get back for 3 or 4 days, but he would call within 3 days to tell me when he could come back to complete the work. That was 2 weeks ago. Don't waste your time and money with this unscrupulous company.

Within 3 hours of the above review being posting, I got a call from the owner of this company saying that he knew nothing of my problems and he was willing to do whatever was necessary to get my review taken down. He agreed that everything the repairman had done was wrong and said the man had been suspended pending the outcome of this case. Since I had already hired another company to repair the door, I told him I thought he should refund the money he had charged  ($300) and I would edit my review to fairly reflect anything he did to try to rectify the poor service. He said he would gladly pay the $300 and any additional amount I thought appropriate but it would be contingent on complete removal of this review. The review will not be taken down by me and no refund has been received. I did not write this review to get paid off. I wrote it to hopefully prevent others from getting ripped off.

resp.text: In response to mr.chestnuts version of the events that took place with him and our company I only have a few words and they start like this.Initially when I read this review I immediatly gave the customer the benefit of a doubt because even though all of our service technitions are  Rigorously followed up on by management staff in order to make sure that no one customer on any given day is left high and dry and not taken care of.We here at Affordable Garage Door Repair Specialist have but one phrase that is required to exercise in every aspect of there daily routine and that is "100% customer satisfaction.The single most piece of proof that we bring to the table is every other review we have ever gotten states the complete opposite of what mr. Chestnut is claiming. And the other piece of very important evidence that was left out of this review is that Mr. Chestnut neglected to inform everyone that he went out and purchased his own belt and decided to install it on his own without our help after we had done the Spring that he had called us about which happened to be still working at the time of this review.Also with the false statement that was made by him that he contacted us the same day when caller I'd can prove otherwise and would be more than happy to post a picture of the document that proves that he has made a very " unscrupulous" claim against our company that almost cost my lead technition his job .So I'm only writing this reply because this type of "SLANDER"should not be taken lightly .And  In finishing I only want to add that we just wish that if there was some type of a misunderstanding or problem on his part that he would have taken it up with us and not tried to be unscrupulous about it Because I assure you as we would any customer we would have gladly made things easier for him and made sure his door was in working condition in the end

name: Ken Spear
text: Robert Williamson of Affordable Garage Door Repair Specialists missed his calling. He should be an educator. Not only did I receive satisfactory work on my inoperable garage door, I learned how it operates as well as how to troubleshoot on my own. Our garage door unit is 20-something years old, and it now functions as if it just got installed. I can't say enough about how easy it was to talk to Robert; most tech folks can be condescending to those of us with a load of questions. I. Am. That. Customer. Just as importantly, AGDRS arrived at my home on the same day as the call. Other companies would have had me wait at least a week out. In my case, it was an emergency as my family and I were en route to a vacation. AGDRS stepped in and made our getaway possible.

resp.text: Thank you very much sir for the kind words.We here at Affordable Garage Door Repair Specialist try to approach all customers in a manner of them being of the utmost importance.This is what sets us aside from the rest in our dedication to not only customers happiness,but actually creating a personal and in most cases,first name relationship with everyone.We are aware  that the everyday hurdles in life can be more than enough stress and having to spend hard earned money for an unexpected garage door issue, definately doesn't make  things any easier.So I myself and my staff just try and give a little bit extra to make our customers feel like there problems are our concerns which is what makes a person feel at least a little better and a small sense of comfort because sometimes the little things are what really make a difference

name: Slimee Ball (300)
text: Mr. Robert Miller is a very nice and professional guy who took pride in his work . Very friendly guy & highly recommended..Thanks Robb

name: Ben Fletcher
text: Affordable Garage Door Repair is excellent!!!! Great service and honest people. I would definitely recommend them.

name: Stephen S
text: I would highly suggest this company. They were prompt in returning my call and got out the same day to repair my garage door which was a tremendous help to me. I wouldn't hesitate to call them again.

name: Bronislaw Baranowski
text:
Robert responded on short notice to repair my daughters broken door. The work done was outstanding. He explained and showed us the problem; fixed it explaining the process every step of the way. The cost of the fix was more than reasonable for the time, effort and materials he put in to fix the problem.

I highly recommend him for any garage door needs you may have.

name: Jason Newcomer
text: Rob answered my call immediately and within two hours Steven arrived at my house to inspect my opener. Both Rob and Steve were very friendly and professional. Most importantly, Rob was forthcoming about prices and options and gave me a great deal on replacing my opener. Fast, professional service with a 10-year warranty? Count me in—thanks, Rob!

name: Clint Casey
text: Quick to respond, professional, and they do good work. I would definitely use them again.

name: Judy Powell
text: Extremely  professional. Contacted  me when he was  late. It was  so  refreshing  to have a contractor  who  was  truly  interested  in doing a great  job  and  not taking  advantage!!!!!

text: My garage door was shuddering and stopping and way too loud.  Robert came out and within minutes figured it out.  They replaced what needed to be replaced and made those subtle but important adjustments.  Impressively, he saw I needed a new cover for the the control by the door and replaced it as well as getting my light to work.  They have a customer for life!  Outstanding, personal service!

text: I called Mr.Robert twice last year and he  done a wonderful job. If you are having issues with your garage door he is your man.

text: The work that was performed on my garage door was impeccable but I’m not writing this review solely based on that. I am writing this with much thanks and appreciation to Brian Danner who not only performed all the work it took for my garage to function again, but the effort this man displayed in contacting me and giving me the things I needed with my warranty and paperwork. Your efforts don’t go unnoticed Brian. You do a great job and the company is lucky to have you!!! If you want a repair specialist who is 100% about customer service, customer retention and overall quality please use these guys!!!!

text: I needed repairs on my garage that would not open or close properly. I called and Mr Williamson was very helpful.  He was able to diagnose the problem over the phone and told me how to fix it. Now it is working fine. If I ever have any garage problems again this is who I will call.

He is also very friendly! My garage door is like a new one now!
I highly recommend this place if you have any issues with the garage door!

name: dale willis
text: We needed a new garage door ,we called around to the local competition checking prices on them ,then we came to Affordable Garage Door Repair Specialist and knew we had found the right company.Upon intial contact with them I was impressed with the professionalism and knowlage that we recieved.,not to mention the were far lower in cost than everyone else.The day of the install came and they showed up early which is very rare in my experience with most service companies in general.They had the door installed and completed within a few hours ,cleaned up everything and gave me a ten year warranty on everything they did.I wish more companies practiced the kind of good work ethics that they have.I would strongly suggest to anyone in need of a new garage door that you go with this company without hesitation.And in ending I can say that this was one of the best experiences I've had when dealing with home repair companies.Thanks again to Robert and his crew.

name: J Rodock
text: Very knowledgeable and passionate about the science of garage doors! Thank you Brian  Danner for the quick fix and affordable price!

name: Andrew Lander
text: Mr. Robert Williamson (the owner) came out around 7pm to fix my broken garage door, since it would not open. I appreciated that he could come out so late. He gave a quick assessment of the problem, showed me what the problem was, and explained it to me thoroughly. He was professional from start to finish and I felt that I was offered a fair price for his services (especially since he explained everything to me). He accepts credit cards (using Square) and was able to email me the receipt and invoice on the spot from his phone, which was very convenient. I definitely recommend Robert's services!

name: Joseph Cooper
text: Mr. Robert Williamson, The Company's Owner, Came Out, On Saturday, Right Before Easter Sunday, 2018, & Repaired My Garage-Door-Opener, Very Rapidly!  Initially, On The Phone, I Thought That I Was Just Getting An Estimate...So That I Could See What The Financial Damage Would Be!  Also, I Was Going To Call My Home Warranty Company...To See If My Repair Was Covered!  When I Asked Robert About That, He Said, "Normally, These Warranty Companies, Only Pay, If Something In The Garage-Door-Opener Motor Needs Repair!" My Problem Was The Broken Bracket That Connected To The Garage Door!  So, Then I Asked Robert What He Would Charge!  I Was Shocked, Because His Price Was Very Reasonable!  My Next Question Was, Did He Take Debit Cards...As I Carry NO Cash!  He Said, "Of Course!"  Well Then..."Go For It," I Exclaimed!  He Was So Quick...That I Could Hardly Believe It!  He Also Nailed Down Some Other Parts That He Said Would Cause Me Problems, Later On!  NO Charge!  He Did NOT Nickel & Dime Me, To Death!  I Am A Medically Retired Military Veteran...And I Am Very Happy With Mr. Robert Williamsons Work!  Robert Was Professional & I Highly Recommend His Services!  God Bless You, Robert!  You Are An Honest Humble Guy...And I Wish You Great Success In Your Much-Needed Business!  Happy Resurrection Day!

name: Morris Scott
text: I’m a Real Estate Agent and I called and spoke with Robert at 7pm about an issue at one of my listings!  First, I didn’t expect anyone to answer and when he did, I expected him to say he could possibly come out within a couple of days! Well, to my surprise, he told me he could stop by in about 10 minutes and find the issue! He found the issue, corrected the issue, and was done in about half an hour! WOW! Robert was very informative and the pricing was remarkable! Superb customer service! This company will continue to get my business!

name: ANGELA GRAY
text: Very pleased and satisfied with the service we received.  Thank you again Mr. Robert. Will diffinitely use him again. If you need garage door service, even wooden/glass doors installed, Roberts your man.

name: Mike Franklin
text: The spring on my garage door broke late Friday afternoon. When the company I had work on my door didn't contact me, I looked up companies on Angie's List. I wanted someone who could come this weekend to repair the door. AGDRS, was the first on the list and as I was reading about them, they contacted me. I told them my problem and they came the same day. I was amazed with the professionalism, the price and the details of what was needed to make this repair work out. The owner came and repaired my door the same day. I'm very happy with his work. He also guaranteed his work for 10 years. I will be using him for now on.

name: Patrick Andres
text: Quick service, affordable, easy to work with

name: Tom Tengman

name: Mary Ellen Waters
text: Brandon showed up on time, was courteous and thorough. Wonderful customer service and value. He was able to fix my door and gave us tips to prolong it's life!! We thought we may have to purchase a new door but he helped us put that off for a few more years. I highly recommend this family business!

name: Robert colclough
text: Great costumer service. On time. Polite. Courteous. Fixed problem quickly. Did not try to charge for repairs I didn’t need. Highly recommend that you use these folks!!

text: My father had a very good experience with this company today.  Brandon was very knowledgeable and helpful with installation and insured my father had a good understanding of the workmanship of the door.  Ms. Pammy  in the office was very pleasant and helpful as well.  Definitely would recommend using this company for your garage door needs.

name: Dwanda Schwarz
text: I called Garage Door Rescue when our garage doors aged and broke. The Garage door tech came and was very pleasant and helpful. I paid $95 for him to come and measure my garage door space. He then asked me to check a website and order doors. First the hand written webpage was difficult to find as it had an error when written out. Then when I went to the website all my choices were in black and white drawings. I had no idea how this was supposed to look on my house and called the main office. First I received a voicemail and left a message which was never returned, I called a second time basically pleading for help, the woman who called me back sounded aggravated I had interrupted her and had no desire in helping me. I told her that we are a small business as well and we would like to support another family run small business and I would like to pay her and support her company, yet she still did not change her demeanor. Needless to say they came out in November, no help has been provided to ensure we get the doors we want and here we are in January and we still have no doors and none are ordered, and so far all I paid for is someone to measure my doors, and frankly I could have done that for free. I gave them 4 stars though that isnt my honest rating as it is much less, only because I have no desire in hurting their business by a bad review. If you can order garage doors and know what you are getting from a black and white hand sketching then maybe your experience will be better than mine, however, you have to be fully responsible for knowing you are making the right order with little help from my experience. With so many garage door companies online, I could have done the equivalent,  ordered random doors online for a fraction of the cost myself without paying someone nearly $100 to measure my doors for me. I sure wish the office lady would have helped with the order, otherwise what did I hire them for? to measure my doors? really?????

name: Jan McElroy
text: Great service. Very professional. I will definitely use their services again!

name: Barbara Rudolph
text: HIGHLY RECOMMEND! Family owned and operated. Same day service. Fast, friendly, efficient, neat & extremely knowledgeable. Repaired what was needed w/ no sales pitches. Went over & above - replaced missing screws, repaired a loose seal & performed routine maintenance at no additional charge! OUTSTANDING!

name: zoltan varga
text: Sometimes when you make a call for services needed, one becomes apprehensive. You search and search then read reviews to hear what people have written to make a sound decision. Well In my case I called garage door rescue based on their 5 star reviews, not one negative comment. Since I needed my garage door repaired. I knew my anti lock springs were broke so I took a chance on calling them first for an appointment. Brandon aka. Skinny guy arrived this morning. I was at work so my wife had to handle the situation. She kept me in the loop play by play and was so impressed with Brandon beyond words! His professionalism, kind demeanor and knowledge was more than she expected. He repaired my issue, and replaced my door sensors I had on hand, reset the motor settings, oiled the chains. I cannot thank him enough for a Job well done. This place has my business from here on out!

name: Philip Hegji
text: I called Monday evening, and they were able to schedule me for the next morning.  They were on time, professional, and reasonably priced.

name: Chris Elliott
text: Prompt and courteous service. True attention to detail. Above and beyond what was expected. Local business at its best.

name: Shana Bass
text: Wow! Unfortunately, the spring on my garage door broke rendering the door totally inoperable, even to lift manually. What a nightmare for a household with 4 vehicles. I anticipated that I would have to call and make a repair appointment for a time days away and then be trapped at home with that dreaded “window” of time, crossing my fingers that someone would eventually show up to fix it during which time our family would have to do the “car shuffle morning, noon and night. I found recommendations on our neighborhood website for Garage Door Reacue. I called at 8:54am to schedule an appointment and was shocked when the ever so pleasant woman said she could have someone out within the hour. At 9:07, Brandon rang my doorbell with ladder in hand and tools at the ready. He explained exactly what he was going to do and gave me an estimate, which I found to be very reasonable, and within 1 hour I not only had a fully functioning garage door but he had corrected some previous installation issues and did the oiling maintenance on the entire track and door. He was efficient, pleasant and personable. As he pulled out of my driveway having completed the repair at 10:19, I was compelled to write this review (something I don’t normally do) to give praise to a great local company with fantastic customer service for a reasonable price. Thanks GDR for a great experience!

name: Brad Hicks
text:
These guys were fast, professional, and knew what they were doing. So glad I called them.

UPDATE: I called them again (a year later) for a minor issue and they were on time, courteous, and went above an beyond.  Great company.

resp.text: Thank you so much. We appreciate your business

name: Amber Wielkens
text: This is a fantastic company. The receptionist actually apologized for not being able to get to me the same day I called - they came the next day. Brandon arrived right on time and was friendly and polite as well as very knowledgable about everything to do with garage doors. He fixed the part that was broken and told me the things that were showing signs of wear and that he could replace today without any forceful sales pitch. He also gave me a tutorial on how to oil the parts that need it and what kind to buy. All this in about half an hour. Our house is 22 years old and I will definitely be calling GDR the next time something breaks. They are stellar.

name: Kevin McClure
text: Very pleased with the service from Precision Door.  Got a quote from Carl on Wednesday and he was able to install on Friday (today).  They were on time (actually before) and the communication from the company and Carl was incredible.  The price was great and the installation went without a hitch.  Carl and Josh showed up at 9AM and both the double and single car garage doors were installed and ready to go by 10:45.  Will definitely recommend Precision and Carl/Josh to anyone who needs work on their garage doors.

text: I had previously used another business when the belt broke on one of my garage door openers. I am a widow and don't know much about garage openers so I paid for  a new one.  Now this week my second opener broke a chain.  I just didn't believe it could not be repaired so I called Precision after checking them online and their reviews were good. He came on time, the service man was friendly and told me that the belt could be replaced.  It took him less than thirty minutes and saved my having to purchase a new one.  I am grateful for his honesty and good work.  I definitely would recommend this company to all.

name: K. Martin
text: Deceptive advertising!!  I saw their ad saying Overhead Door Service and clicked on the link to call. I asked the rep that answered if this was Overhead Door Company, which is the company that put our doors and motors in at our house in the past. She said that they were. When she couldn't pull up my history I felt something was wrong. When I pressed her again about it, she finally admitted that she wasn't with Overhead Door Company, that I had actually called Precision. If these people will lie to make you think they are a different company to get your business I don't want anything to do with them!

resp.text:
K. Martin,

*Edited to add: The ad has been taken down and again, we apologize for any confusion and misunderstanding.

We would like to begin by apologizing that when you clicked what should have been an Overhead Door Company ad you reached Precision Door Service. After being made aware of the issue with our ad’s wording yesterday, we have been in the process of having the wording corrected. This process takes a bit of time and we apologize again that you were misled. Please know that this was not done on purpose and should be rectified shortly. Our Director of Operations would like to speak to you personally regarding this issue, but we are unable to find your call in our system. Please give Eric Kee a call at 256-400-4500 or email at manager@praestopds.com.

Thank you,

Precision Door Service

name: Fab Shop
text: I was in Kuwait overseas and the Garage was acting unusual and wouldn’t remotely close. I told my wife to call this company since they had good reviews. The technician told her that we needed a new garage unit as ours was fried and they didn’t carry the parts for our current system. They quoted us approximately $550-$650 for a new install. I refused this offer and checked the garage out once I got home and found out there was a spider web clearly blocking the door sensor. Grabbed a paper towel and cleaned it....and everything works great. They either tried to rip us off since I was overseas taking advantage of my wife’s kindness.... or the tech had no idea what he was doing. Either way...get a second opinion if you go with this company. I’m still hard to find honest professionals these days in all fields.

text: I can't go on enough about this company! I called just this morning and had my service visit scheduled the same day after I got off work. During the repair he also spoke to me about future things that my unit might need and what to look out for. He also checked my garage unit as a whole to make sure that I needed no other service. After he left, I realized I had forgotten to check to make sure my light on the unit was working, and of course it wasn't. One quick call and Justin turned around and CAME BACK. Turns out I didn't have a bulb in there at all and put one in for me. If you need a company do garage door work USE THIS COMPANY. You won't regret it. name: Dave Bannister
text:
NEVER call this company!! I was quoted $700 and was told I needed a new door by this company only to find out that there is NOTHING wrong with the door at all. It just needs to be serviced properly. They sent the same two men out to my house on two separate occasions to "fix" my garage door. The last time they "fixed" it, it just fell apart. So, I called the competition, and they were VERY knowledgeable and helpful....and are only charging me a $98 service call to fix my garage door instead of making me pay hundreds of dollars for a new door that I DON'T need. STAY AWAY from Precision Door!!!
SINCE I last posted, the company has in fact done everything they said they would do. They called me personally to apologize for what had happened AND they refunded my money. SO, what I can positively say about Precision is that at least they do try and make it right the best they can. I am happy for the way they handled the problem I had with them, so a big thank you for that! Not every company would do that....most would probably even have deleted the review....but they took it in stride and did the right thing! I'm impressed....

resp.text:
Mr. Bannister

Please accept our sincere apology for the issues with your garage door system. We will be sending all your money back to you for the work we did on your garage door last year.

We have recently completed a 25 point safety inspection as well as offering 3 different options for the repair cost and or replacement of your garage door.  Our IDEA certified garage door techs always try to be professional as well accurate in their recommendations to our customers.

We also have a 100% satisfaction guarantee that is posted on our website page. Beyond talking with the Huntsville Manager, discussing the issues with our service technician. Looking at both of the 25 point safety inspections and refunding your total amount of $124.99. (total amount paid to our company from our first of two visits in July of 2017 and December of 2017) Please let me know if there is anything further that we can do to provide the 100% satisfaction that we work very hard to provide to all of our customers everyday. My personal cell phone number is 901 832-4999 and I am available to discuss the issue at your convenience.

Thanks for your business.

Jon Russell
General Manager
Precision Overhead Door Service Huntsville, Alabama

name: Bradley Heichelbech
text:
So my garage had an old garage door opener from before we bought the house. A couple days ago, my wife informed me that the center track had fallen, so I checked it out and when pieces didn't match up right decided to call a professional to take a look.

Enter Carl.

He came out within an hour of me having called and had the track repaired in no time. He didn't just call it quits though, he was going to get the wires back up and out of the way first. That was when the old motor decided it was going to first try to drive the door into the ground and then die.

Thankfully, the door itself was unharmed but the motor was shot. Carl didn't try to oversell me on the garage door opener and talk me up to a higher price point. In fact, he laid out the options and made it clear that the least expensive option would work just fine.

Since this went from a simple repair to a replacement and they needed room to work, I scheduled for him to come back the next day so I could clear space in my garage, which could at least now be opened manually in the meantime. Instead of coming at the scheduled time, he called me when he had a slot come open several hours earlier and asked if that would work since I'd told him I work from home.

By the time my actual appointment time today rolled around, Carl had already changed out the motors. He made sure that everything was working properly and went so far as to help me get the app working on my phone before leaving. He was friendly, professional, and well informed about the products themselves.

I would recommend Precision Door Service of Huntsville without hesitation.

name: Shawn P
text: Just had Carl look at our garage door & opener - we had just moved in and had been having intermittent issues for the last few days.  Precision Door sent a text and picture so we would recognize Carl.  Carl called and let us know when he would arrive (which he did on time).  The whole time Carl was very polite and you could tell he knew his stuff as he tracked down the interference to the opener - he was kind enough to explain what he was doing and why.  Interference was identified and problem was solved.  We are very happy with the service provided by Precision Door and wouldn't hesitate to call them again and/or recommend to neighbors/friends.  Thanks Carl and have a Happy & Safe 4th!

Prior to installation, we were contacted to set up a firm installation date and time (which was honored right on time). He and Tyler were super helpful and knowledgeable, did not try to "up-sell" me, they were honest and fixed the problem. They had the door on track, up and running in an hour. Highly recommend this company and will be calling them when it is time to replace the door!

Spring snapped in half on my garage door. Precision came out to evaluate my door and the tech told gave me several options to choose from. Replacing all the parts I needed to and being covered by a 5 year warranty was well worth what I paid.

The tech called me and let me know he could be out there an hour early which worked to my advantage. He (Jonathon) was very knowledgeable and polite. Replacing my spring, bearing plates and rollers took less than 30 minutes. He even took the extra time to ensure all of my wiring was installed correctly. This was above and beyond at no charge. I highly recommend Precision Door Service and will use them for all my future garage door business.

The customer service from the woman who took my call, Jessica, to the two techs who came out was absolutely exceptional. Use them .

name: Nathan Smeal
text: Came out same day as I called(within 2 hours) which was great.  It ending up needing a little tuneup and some lubrication, but they also made sure all the calibrations were correct as well.  Only took about 30 minutes or so and serviceman was friendly and answered all of my maintenance questions!  Great service and reasonable cost, would highly recommend.

name: Larry Blackwell
text: My garage door spring broke on a Friday with a car trapped inside. I was sure I couldn’t get anyone here before Monday. I used Home Advisor and got an immediate call from Precision Door who said they could be here between 6 and 8 pm the same day. They were able to get here at 4:30 and were gone by 5 - door fixed. Very professional and efficient. Price was reasonable. Definitely will use again if needed.

name: Cheryl Muskevitsch
text:
Jonathan and Mitchell were on time, friendly and I felt comfortable with their processes and workmanship. Price per door for materials and installation were pretty good. I highly recommend this company.
If you go through Home Adviser to make the appointment make sure you check the Precision Door website for a discount on services or materials.

text: Came out same day as I called(within 2 hours) which was great.  It ending up needing a little tuneup and some lubrication, but they also made sure all the calibrations were correct as well.  Only took about 30 minutes or so and serviceman was friendly and answered all of my maintenance questions!  Great service and reasonable cost, would highly recommend.

name: steve welden
text: One of the springs on my current door broke, trapping both my vehicles in the garage. I found the problem about one o'clock Saturday afternoon. Precision door was able to get my problem fixed that afternoon. The technicians were courteous, up front with my options, and serviced the door quickly. I am very happy with Precision door, both as a company and with the technicians who serviced my home. I would highly recommend them.

name: Joe Fairchild
text:
Once again, Precision Doors exceeded my expectations.

Getting ready for vacation, a problem arose with the garage door ... it wouldn't close all the way. I was resolved to shut it manually and lock it into place with a screwdriver when I gave Precision a call (they had installed the door last year). They were out that day! Diagnosed the problem (a stripped gear on the opener) and repaired it with a part they had on hand (no need to order and wait!).

"So, while you're here ..." They looked a spot I had dented on the door ... popped things back into place and straightened it out.

"So, while you're here..." I had been having problems with my remote opener. The tech explained that it was probably a bad "button" on the romote. They had a replacement with them, but told me I could probably get it cheaper at Home Depot or Walmart! Now that's the honesty I like from a company.

Again, very well pleased,

name: Mary Van Kuren
text: I am SUPER  pleased with the new garage door and opener that was installed at my home.  I would highly recommend Precision to others.

name: Douglas Cox
text:
OUTSTANDING !!! in every respect.  Our spring broke the morning we were to leave on a road trip.  The young lady in the office called the installers that could get to us the quickest, all were on other jobs.  Johnathon was able to get to us in a few hours and that was including a long drive from a Boaz job site.  His work was fast and TOTALLY PROFESSIONAL.  5 stars plus !!!
I was so happy that I didn't even ask about the military discount.

name: Andy Mize
text: Great service once again. Austin solved problem quickly and fixed problem. Highly recommend!!

text: A quick inquiry on their websight led to an easy online chat. I got the info I needed and set up an convenient appt. Tech called en route, I also received courtesy texts. He arrived punctually. Assessed and repaired the problem (broken spring) in less than 1.5 hrs at great price. Helped me take advantage of a special, and showed me how to replace a cosmetic part (the bottom rubber) myself, saving me more money.  It was a very good experience. Thank you Tony!

text: Very fast and accurate. Beware up sell pitches. I elected for bare minimum and it's fine.

name: sagan1989
text: Showed up on time.  The repairman was knowledgeable and efficient. The garage door rolls up and down quietly and smoothly.

name: Troy Farsoun
text: These guys came to my house at exactly the time they said they would be there, replaced my garage door and both springs in freezing temperatures 30 mph winds, and after a minor mix-up at the warehouse, they even gave me the more expensive windowed garage door at the same price as the one without. Very courteous, polite to my wife, and they cleaned up their mess. This is the first time I've ever had a garage door replaced, but what more could you ask for?

name: Evan Paulish
text: Arrived quickly and extremely friendly. Great work. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Austin Hambright is a great asset and he works really hard to provide the best customer service possible everyday. Thanks for the review.

name: Terry Owens
text: TJ is one of the smartest people I have every met.  He put two and two together and figured out one of my remotes got wet and was shorting out, causing my garage to go up and down on it's own.  I will always ask for TJ to come work on my garage doors.

name: Brian Smith
text: This company is first class. From the CSR setting the appt to the final payment for services rendered there was never a hiccup. TJ and Tyler showed up early to the appt and gave me options for replacement of my garage door opener. They got it installed and were cleaned up and gone inside of 2 hrs. Will definitely be referring these guys!

name: Beth Cox
text: I've used them twice now and they are super! Professional, timely, and no surprises. Would recommend them highly!

name: Jeff Williams
text: Was in need of an emergency repair on a Sunday as my garage door came right off the rails. I gotta give big props to Austin Hambright who came out within the hour of my call and got my door fixed in about a half-hour !!! Will definitely think of these guys in the future if I'm replacing or upgrading my garage door.

name: Kiernan Smith
text: Our retaining cable broke on a Saturday afternoon. Called customer service, talked to a real person and she  scheduled a repair for an hour later! TJ called prior to his arrival and was courteous and expedidant in his repairs. Thank you Precision Door!

name: Ronald Fritze
text: On 1 May, the spring on our garage door broke so that we could not even raise the door manually.   We had one car trapped inside.  Call Precision about noon.  Got an appointment for 4:00 that afternoon.  TJ, the technician called and said he could come early.  He arrived and assessed the situation.  Showed me our options.  He then proceeded to replace the spring and refurbish some other parts.  Door was working again by 3:30.  TJ is a great person.  If we have trouble in the future, I would call Precision and hope we get TJ as well.  I highly recommend Precision to anyone who needs a garage door and its opener repaired.

name: Herb Hughes
text: The technicians responded promptly, were friendly and professional, and made the repairs quickly.

name: Scott Bartow
text:
I really liked the speed and professionlism displayed by Austin. I also want to give a shout out of thanks to Carrie and Eric. Carrie provided a great experience concerning all the efforts she displayed fixing an administrative problem of which was my fault. She didn't have to work as hard as she did...great customer service. She went above and beyond to get my problem taken care on the weekend versus waiting until Monday.  I would do business with Precision even if they were double in price(which they are not)  The comfort of knowing that you will be taken care of by people like Carrie gives me a tremendous feeling of confidence and caring with this company and their employees. I just can't say enough good. Don't hesitate to put your faith in them. Thanks Carrie and thank you Precision for hiring competent and caring people like her.

Madison, Al
Very Satified Customer!

resp.text: We are very lucky to have great employees like Carrie and Austin. Thanks for your review.

text:
They arrived to my house in no time and was ready to fix my garage door that could not open. They gave my wife and I am few quotes on our options to fix the door. Then in no time, our garage door was back up and running. Their prices were affordable, the clean up was great, and we enjoyed our technicians company while he was here. Over all, Precision Door Service did a great job and in the future, they are going to be the 1st company we call when our garage doors need fixing. Great Job you all and keep up the good work.

P.S. Their customer service is amazing, they contacted us a few days later just to make sure things were working out fine.

:)

text: Great company. Showed up the same day and fixed my garage door problems. Thanks

text:
The technician, T.J. called before arriving for my appointment to let me know he was on the way. He was very knowledgeable and thorough in his assessment of my garage door that was not functioning properly.

He took the time to show me the problem and explain exactly what was wrong and what it would take to fix it. He then provided an estimate via a tablet for me to approve (he actually provided three different options for fixing the door depending on how much I wanted to spend). I chose the basic repair, and I am very happy with the results!

T.J. was very polite and professional and I will certainly use Precision Door Service in the future if I need further maintenance.

text: TJ quickly repaired an 18 year old motor!

name: Ray Ingram
text:
I have used PDS several times now over the last 12 months and will say that everyone I have talked to from the intake phone call to the final delivery by the technicians has been outstanding.
The costs have been very competitive plus PDS will provide certain discounts (10% AAA). The same installers did both of my installations. The 1st one was on the homes garages and the 2nd time was on the boat house over water. They came prepared with needed equipment, tools and expert knowledge.
The crew was exactly on-time per the appointed time, the clean-up was "spic-& span" clean.
I highly recommend PDS for all your repair/replacement needs.

Ray

name: Kathy Harkleroad
text: I was in an emergency situation when my garage door jumped the track and wouldn't close. TJ from Precision Door Service was at my house within hours and managed to fix a mangled mess and got the door closed. It was hot as hell and TJ and his helper worked continuously until the job was done. Then he told us the price of the bottom panel and had it ordered on the spot. When it came to be installed I requested TJ because I know the job will be done with professionalism, courtesy, and no complaints or grumbling. I'll use Precision Door Service again in the future and will highly recommend them to anyone who might need them. Oh, TJ also called and told him he was on the way and gave me a timeline as to his arrival. I was also able to go to their website and see a picture of him BEFORE he even arrived. Great company!

name: Renee Graham
text: Fast, friendly, professional service.  I'm a fan and a future customer if I need anything.

resp.text: Thanks for the review for Jonathan Collins.

name: Jim Duttweiler
text: Fast service, reasonable prices, professional

name: awelliott
text:
When raising the garage door, the brace holding my left rail came apart, causing loss of tension on one of the cables and my door to detach from the rail and jam sideways in the 1/2 up position.  In addition, the right rail was significantly bent.  I called Precision Door Service on a Saturday evening, and they offered to dispatch someone to fix it that night.  I decided I could wait until Monday, so I set up an appointment for that morning.

Jonathan and Carl showed up at approximately 8:00 a.m., quickly assessed the situation, and had my door repaired in less than an hour.  I was certain that I would need a new rail set, but they were able to repair the existing rail to the point where the door works like new.  They could have easily replaced the rail and charged me more.

This is the second time I have used Precision Door, and I have had outstanding service in each instance.  They have my highest recommendation as well as all of my future work.

resp.text: Thanks for the detailed review for Jonathan and Carl.

name: Julie Grady
text: Jonathon was very prompt and professional. I would highly recommend Precision Door Service.

text: Fast response, great work, fair price. I will all them every time for garage door work

In about 40 minutes he was done completely. His professionlism was top notch and the  door worked better than ever. Although I was quoted a cheaper price by other companies, I strongly  feel I made the  right choice going with Precison. name: Gary Hardman
text: They have done overhead door repairs for me several times. They don’t respond to my phone calls, I have to keep calling and literally beg them to do my repairs. I am changing to someone else that will appreciate my business. Don’t call them unless you have a month or more to wait on them to show up and do your repairs.

resp.text:
Mr. Hardman,
We have searched your name in our database and have no record of your name in our system. Our database dates back to 1996 and is categorized by name and address. Please reach out to us at 334-285-5275 with your address so we can research this further to see if it was indeed our company. We strive for great customer service and would love to correct this issue if it was our company.

name: Sheila Bergquist
text: They put a new door up and suddenly my door wouldn't close. They came out and "fixed" it, and it messed up again. They were very rude about the fact that it wasn't working. My friend is going to have to order things and fix it himself. I will never use them again.

resp.text:
Mr. Bergquist,
We have searched your name in our database and have no record of your name in our system. Our database dates back to 1996 and is categorized by name and address. Please reach out to us at 334-285-5275 with your address so we can research this further to see if it was indeed our company. We strive for great customer service and would love to correct this issue if it was our company.

name: Jesse Richards
text: Overhead door was able to program remotes and vehicles for me. Great customer service. From the initial call to the service call, very professional and polite. I would like to thank Beverly for your patience and knowledge!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Richards! We are glad we could get you taken care of! We strive to do our best!

name: Rita Pool
text: They showed up on time and installed my new garage door in a professional manner. From quote to install was only a few days. Very satisfied

resp.text: We hope you enjoy your new garage door Ms. Pool. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to work with you.

name: Hoyt Middleton
text: Super knowledgeable and great service

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Middleton for your kind words and your 5 star review!

name: CHAD WISWALL
text: Overhead was able to come right out and fixed our door lock within minutes. Great service and great timing!

resp.text: We appreciate your business Mr. Wiswall. Thank you!

name: Andre Firefighter Young
text: Nice people

name: Robert Cofer
text: Overhead was fantastic. I purchased a fireplace and it is beautiful. I had a slight problem with a piece of the hardware from the manufacturer and it took some time to resolve- but instead of leaving me out and cold (pun intended) Kayla and staff brought me out a brand new burner while they sorted out warranty with the manufacturer. That’s the sort of customer service that leaves you feeling warm inside (intended again). Will do business with them again and recommend to anyone that may be able to serve.

resp.text: Thank you for the favorable review Robert!  We do have things go wrong occasionally, but we do our best to make it right!

name: Jeff Baker
text: The best. They live here and they work here. Buy from them.

resp.text: Thank you for your favorable review!  We appreciate your business!

name: Thomas Locke
text: Everyone I spoke with from Heather, who scheduled my service call to Kevin, who actually performed the replacement procedure were wonderful,  friendly, and extremely knowledgeable about all things garage door related. Kevin went so far as to inspect and snug every single bolt on the door and he wasn't even there for that. After this initial experience,  Overhead Door and Fireplace will be the only company I use when my garage door needs attention.  Prices were very fair, especially considering the danger involved and Kevin knocked it out in 20 mins! I can't say enough about this company. Would most definitely recommend to others.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your favorable review.  We look forward to serving you in the future and appreciate your business!

name: Chandra Steele
text:
My experience with Overhead Door  Company was superb. I was extremely satisfied with the servies provided and the professionalism exemplified.  The price for the service rendered was very reasonable. The repairman was very knowledgeable and humble. I highly recommend Overhead Door Company if you are having problems with your garage door or fireplace.

An appreciative and satisfied customer,

name: Jeffrey Haun
text: Overhead Door Company in Millbrook AL was very easy to work with scheduling my garage door repair. They scheduled my appointment two days after I made the call. The repairman was prompt and quickly diagnosed and fixed my problem. I appreciate the service and will call you for all my future needs. Excellent company. Extremely nice repairman. Thanks.

name: Kenni T.
text:
Needed a remote opener for an older garage door.
Service was with a smile as well as knowledgable and fast.

resp.text: Thank you for your favorable review.  We appreciate your business.  Merry Christmas!

name: T.C. Fincher
text: Technician arrived on time, was very professional yet friendly.  He fixed our issues and was patient to explain the problems we had.  Glad we got him out before the upcoming cool snap.

resp.text: Thank you for the favorable review!  We appreciate your business!

name: Maxine Tinsley
text: I would give them a five star they were very professional very business they knew what they were doing and very polite.  I would   Highly recommend Overhead Door and Fireplace Company.

resp.text:

Cheers,

Overhead Door and Fireplace Company

name: James Milton
text: Thanks again to Sean for taking care of the door issues. In this day and time it hard to get and keep well trained guys. You better do what it takes to keep this guy.

name: Tonya Robison
text: Garage door was broken. Turned out to be the spring. Overhead Door got me on the schedule quickly, repairman was on time, polite, and finished the repair fast. Great experience. I would recommend Overhead Door.

text: They didn't exactly what I needed. And did a great job at that. I would recommend them in a heartbeat.

resp.text:

Cheers,

Overhead Door and Fireplace Company

name: au frankie
text: Very Thorough Work! Had a carriage replaced on one door and technician made adjustments to and lubricated other door while he was there. I could not be more pleased with punctuality and time to repair. Ask for Kevin, it gets him out of the warehouse!

text: Easy to set up repair service appointment.  They came at the appointed time and did the job I needed done.  I will reply on them in the future.  Good work.

text: The technician was very punctual and extremely nice. He had my problem resolved very quickly. He even went beyond and serviced my second unit. I was very pleased with the service extended.

resp.text: So nice to hear, thank you!

text: Very friendly, Fast Service....their technician was the Best! Hands down...had a broken spring, he repaired it with no problem.

text: From the person who answered the phone to the technician who repaired my garage door I had excellent service. My garage was repaired the next morning at a reasonable price. Professional, friendly, and prompt!

text: Good luck trying to get anyone to call you back and service your doors. I have been trying for a two months to get someone to work on my overhead doors. Save yourself some trouble and look elsewhere.

Craig
